Pedro offered us refreshments, allowed us to relax in the air conditioned lobby, called a taxi to take us to the airport and helped bring our bags to the cab when it arrived. They welcomed us back with open arms, even though we weren't checking in again and this was an enormous kindness we will never forget. Please know that a hotel is NOTHING without its staff and your employees are THE BEST people I have ever encountered in the hospitality business. Bravo H10 Madison!!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband, our 2 boys age 9 and 12, and I stayed here for 2 nights before a cruise out of Barcelona. This hotel was perfect. It’s more of a boutique hotel and very modern. Didn’t feel like a chain. Perfect location. You can walk to a bunch of sights and just wander around the Gothic Quarter and La Rambla during the day and night. We hailed a taxi right in front of the hotel to take us to Sagrada Família (book your tickets online). The front desk staff helped us book tickets to the FCA Barca Camp Nau (which my son wanted to see) and they also helped us get a taxi to the cruise port, and booked our hotel transfer from the airport. The staff spoke English which was helpful. We stayed in a suite, which worked for us. I emailed the hotel ahead of time and they helped me book it. Our view was of an alley and residential balconies, seemed pretty quiet. Surprisingly, however, at 11:45 pm on Friday night a local neighbor set of fireworks off the rooftop right next to our room window. Kind of interesting/cool/festive. It was LGTBQ pride parade weekend so maybe it was just celebratory fireworks, not sure if it’s the norm. My son went in the rooftop pool while husband and I had a drink up there. They provide bathrobes in the rooms, which my son wore up to the roof, so the experience had a spa-like feel. Pool is small but a good place to rest and relax for about an hour or so. Awesome photo opp of the cathedral. My only complaint is the rooftop drink/food service was awkwardly slow. Breakfast was excellent, and the food service was top notch. Complimentary water and espresso machine in the room was nice, too. it was really a great way to start our vacation. I wish we had stayed there in Barcelona a couple more nights.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Can’t recommend this place enough - excellent and prompt check in and gorgeous new rooms . The hotel is close to Plaza Catalunya and shops as well as la ramblas and bouqueria market with everything in walking distance. Special mention and thanks to staff : Guillermo, Judith, Carla and Jesus.Excellent breakfast, roof top pool deck and lunch was fabulous. This is the Place to stay.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Found this hotel while searching online ... booked it for the price and location in the Gothic quarter . I can’t tell you the views from the roof top pool/ lounge eating area is indescribable ! The hotel staff so professional and even corresponded to my inquiries via email timely ! You are in the heart of the Gothic district and that’s a plus . The cathedral views of the 500 yrs old church was unbelievable !!!!! What a great find ... lucky us!!! The breakfast and roof top tapas style eating was wonderful we just ate here frequently . Look these are my photos from the roof and street !!! I would come back here anytime!!! It’s so charming ... I usually stay in high end hotels but this was great !!!! The front desk guy even remembered my name from emails 12 months ago lol
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My daughter and I have thoroughly enjoyed the location, service, and spacious roomhere. Super location by the cathedral and lovely rooftop terrace and pool. Only caution (and a small one), is the only night we asked the front desk to recommend a restaurant, it was terrible (mediocre food and poor service).
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It’s always tricky selecting a hotel, but we nailed this one.Firstly, the staff are just terrific and nothing is a problem. Special mention to Pedro!Secondly, the rooms are spacious and well equipped and have excellent beds.Thirdly, on hot days the roof top pool is a godsend. And remember to take your camera when you go for a swim – there are excellent views of the city’s landmarks.Fourthly, the breakfast is a treat and a dining experience each morning. Maybe a glass of champagne with your breakfast? Finally, the hotel is in a great location. Just minutes to walk to many of the tourist attractions, and then just far enough away to enjoy quiet and peaceful evenings.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rooms were good, breakfast nice. Really loved the decor in the public areas, light & welcoming.Staff were delightful. Looked like they were genuinely happy working there. Lots of chill seating in the foyer with complimentary bubbles in the afternoon.Really nice rooftop area to relax, comfy seating. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Haven’t got a negative thing to say about this hotel. We loved the location, the stylish decor, the staff, the breakfast, our room. We stayed in a junior suite which had space for a pull out bed for our son and a lovely huge bathroom. Our view was of a neighbourhood courtyard which was lovely and quiet. My parents were in a king room with two balconies overlooking the street and up to the cathedral. Absolutely stunning view and atmosphere as people walked by. My husband is in a wheelchair and all parts of the hotel were accessible. The roof top area is incredible and the perfect place to meet friends for sangria at the end of the evening and enjoy the city lights, which we did. Just as beautiful during the day. The breakfast room is gorgeous and the staff very welcoming and the food very good. A buffet as well as a cooked to order menu. Would definitely stay again.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent three days in Barcelona on recent European holiday. This is the hotel we stayed in while in Barcelona. Was such a wonderful stay. Everyone so nice and accommodating. Buffet breakfast magnificent. Roof top bar with most fabulous views. Bed so comfortable and shower amazing! Wish this hotel line was in the United States as well.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the first time I've stayed at an H10 hotel and it was a great introduction. The room was very comfortable. Can't beat two bottles of complimentary water a day! I like my room freezing cold and I was not disappointed. The rooftop pool and bar area with the views of Barcelona Cathedral nearby is the perfect place to hang out after a day of sightseeing in Barcelona. The staff was wonderful and accommodating. All in all, I had a great time in Barcelona because of the staff at the hotel.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: LOved this hotel so much!!! Made our stay in BCN fabulous! Location was perfectly set in my favorite Gothic Qtr. Immaculately clean. Customer service was great. Those bath towels!... 10 inches thick (a lil exaggeration, but definitely the thickest I've ever had at a hotel) and that shower!!! Breakfast was fantastic. We couldn't get enough of the gorgeous roof top bar, pool, & views! We also, really enjoyed our complimentary champagne everyday w those marshmallows. It was an outstanding way to end our long trip abroad!!! We felt pampered & rested for our long haul home to reality!!! I will be sending my clients to this hotel when booking BCN. ❤️April Fontes/Travel Enthusiasts LLC/OwnerAdvisor
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a first-rate hotel in every sense. The staff was exceptional. The rooms were nice, spacious, and comfortable. The breakfast was very good with many options. The cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a few minutes walk away.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I spent 6 nights at H10Madison and loved every minute. Perfectly located near Cathedral in Barri Gothic neighborhood and within easy walking distance of everything. The staff was so friendly and cordial - we had a great King size room with lots of amenities and the Continental Breakfast was excellent. Our favorite part of our experience was the roof top terrace and pool where we found ourselves almost every afternoon - enjoying the sun, the poolside cocktails and snacks and relaxing after a day of sightseeing. We highly recommend this little gem of a hotel!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had 3 rooms here and got treated like children from the staff who was very impatient for some reason. WiFi was down for days and they did not seem to care at all. Not even a suggestion where to get WiFi or anything or even an apology for the inconvenience. For all the good reviews this was a huge disappointment and would never recommend a place that can’t just answer questions in pleasant manner.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The H10 Madison is a nearly brand-new hotel in a perfect location, with to-die-for views from its rooftop bar/restaurant. The rooms are large by European standards, and the rainfall shower was so enveloping I might have stayed under it all day and missed all the delicious jamon (luckily I extricated myself from the shower eventually). Staff at the restaurant is terrific - efficient and friendly.  I did have two issues at the hotel. The first was a smaller issue with the cleanliness of the bathroom. The second was a significant customer service issue upon our departure. However, after I reported this issue to the hotel, I was contacted by the front desk manager, Rodolphe Pottier, who was extremely kind and accommodating, assuring me the employee at issue had been made aware of the issue and that they were working to improve the service. My interactions with Mr. Pottier were very positive and have caused me to rewrite my review to upgrade it to five stars. Given his response to this issue, I have no hesitation in recommending H10 Madison for your Barcelona stay. It really is an amazing, beautiful place in an incredible location!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is a very nicely designed and furnished small hotel in the gothic quarter. The rooms are comfortable and well lit. The vanity kit was well stocked. The restaurant served a very nice breakfast where you could order food cooked from the ala carte menu. Staff are well trained and professional.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: There are so many things to love about this hotel. We enjoyed everything from the decor, convenient location, knowledgeable and friendly staff, rooftop pool/bar, and delicious food. Such great views from our balcony and the rooftop also. We would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We can’t say enough about this hotel. The personnel were all so pleasant, always greeting us with a smile.The breakfast buffet was excellent, not to mention, we could also order cappuccino. The location is awesome as well. We took a taxi to Park Guell one morning and 10 miles later, we found ourselves back at the hotel; that’s how easy it was to find.They are in a great spot, not too busy, but, less than 5 minutes to all the action.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My sister and I just returned from staying at this hotel for the weekend. The hotel is beautiful. The rooms are well equipped and the bathrooms are nice and spacious. Complimentary shampoo and conditioner provided. We did not chose to have breakfast here as was way too expensive (23 euros per person)We was welcomed on arrival with a nice glass of cava each. The room wasn't ready although we did ask for an earlier check in (we arrived at the hotel at 1:30 PM)The rooftop area is GORGEOUS with a lovely pool and sunloungers. The waiter was very slow and we found we sat waiting a very long time before we then asked if we could order a drink. The views from the rooftop were beautiful, right next to the cathedral and only a 10 min walk to Las Ramblas and about a 15 min walk to the beach.Definitely would stay here again
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is hotel has it all! The location is fantastic, just near the Cathedral, in the centre of Barcelona. The room, beds, shower and balcony were perfect with and we even had a very nice view at the Cathedral. But the thing that makes this hotel different from a lots of other hotels is the service! For the service I would say 11/10, each one of them gives you the perfect feeling, from the manager to the waiter to the cleaning lady to ... They were all unbelievable competent.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Absolutely love this hotel! The staff is incredibly friendly and helpful with anything we need. The location is walking distance to all the restaurants and bars. The rooms were incredible and the view was even more special. If you are coming to Barcelona, stay here!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We thoroughly enjoyed the H10 Madison in Barcelona. The rooms were exceptionally clean and lovely, the lobby is very tastefully done with the perfect touch of elegance and the rooftop bar is mind-blowing thanks to the views and service. And the location was absolutely perfect for us, close to restaurants and away from them hustle. We would definitely return.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Yes, H10 may be a chain, and that often leads to a purely commercial approach to the hospitality product - but not here - this is a hotel with personality, as well as world class quality. Reception - fab, room - fab, breakfast - fab, location - fab, rooftop terrace - fab, housekeeping - fab. But ultimately its the staff who make or break a hotel - and here the staff are absolutely splendid - always smiling, always willing to talk and to listen, always helpful. Loved our stay. WE WILL BE BACK! (and that's a promise).
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything was outstanding. Great location in the Gothic Quarter - great service upon check in. Room was absolutely beautiful. The bar and restaurant staff are great, and the food and drinks were perfect. I would recommend this location to anyone staying in Barcelona!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a wonderful stay at this cute hotel. Great rooms, close distance to most everything and a very nice rooftop view, bar, pool. Walking distance to some great food options. Right in the Gothic Quarter which is our favorite place to shop and people watch.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed in a Junior Suite for a week.Arrival was excellent - porter attended as soon as we got out the taxi and took luggage.Bubbly or water on arrival and staff were all excellent during our stay and very friendly.Room was very nice.I like to see the surroundings from any room i stay in and when i drew the nets back i was shocked at the disgusting ugly view of in your face scruffy terraces from apartments next door.Not good.We also had quite a lot of noise from Spanish kids out on their balconies which ruined a few afternoons rest.No drawers in the room.This is bad and needs putting right.I have stayed in 1 Star hotels and had ample drawers.Lovely large bathroom and rain forest shower,Room was serviced very well by staff.Air conditioning was a nuisance as it kept turning off due to the French door not closing properly.You had to get it just right before it worked or bang and push the door firmly shut.Some noise a few nights from the room above.Footsteps for over an hour ! maybe they were line dancing ? sounded like it.Free safe in the room .Two lifts in the hotel both very small and seem to have a mind of their own.Very slow.Lovely rooftop terrace and small pool.Great views.It rained for a few days which wets the seats so even when the sun has come out and they look dry they are not !Main restaurant was shut most nights which was a shame.I do not like sitting outside to eat when the weathers not great so i feel that facility was not there.Breakfast was very nice.Plenty of choice and they do wait on you at the table.I dont like eating off black plates ! white ones would be better and no lettuce garnish with egg and bacon ! One morning service was very bad.Over 30 mins wait for my order and no croissants either.Waitress said 5 minutes in oven.Half an hour later i asked again and was told 5 minutes more in oven ! They eventually were served and were cold ! so i dont think they had been in any oven.My breakfast order was wrong so after a 30 min wait i had to wait again for the correct order to be served.Pity this happened.Hotel is a lovely building and been open a year.Last night when we went back to the room there was a bottle of bubbly on ice and a plate of strawberries dipped in chocolate.We had not ordered this so rang reception just to make sure what it was and we were told its for us on the house so a lovely gesture.The female receptionist had arranged this so many thanks.Sorry i didnt get her name.All i know is that she is from the Philippines.So despite the spoilers i would fully recommend staying here.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A superb hotel. Central location; rooms spacious, well decorated & stocked with all kinds of needments. One of the best hotel breakfasts I’ve ever had. But, more than anything else, it’s the service provided by the staff which goes above & beyond the call of duty. I was unfortunate enough to have a serious fall in a neighbouring restaurant, cracking two ribs [the doctor thinks]. Their care & kindness were outstanding, just amazing. I could go on for ages but I won’t, I’ll just say that I would recommend the H10 Madison to anyone. [And the staff for a Hotel Oscar, if there is such a thing!]
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is the top of the line. Our room was large with king size bed & large bathroom with shower. Very quiet & very clean. The hotel had all the amenities you could ask for,a restaurant, bar, near local sites. Very helpful staff. Nice lobby to sit & relax with a glass of complimentary champagne. We highly recommend & would stay there again.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a gem in the area with lots of pastry shops and restaurants within walking distance. The Cathedral is a short walk away at the end of the street. The hotel sports a rooftop pool, restaurant and bar. Would definitely stay again if in Barcelona!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent the weekend of the 17th to 20th May in Barcelona, having visited once before on a Cruise stop off we wanted to explore this beautiful city. Having spent many hours searching through lists of hotels online, we kept coming back to the H10 Madison and decided this was the one for us.What a fabulous choice! The staff are extremely pleasant and nothing is to much trouble, there is coffee machine provided in the room, but being a typical Brit I just wanted a cup of tea, no problem, a kettle and tea were provided without any issue.The rooms are lovely, nice big comfortable beds with high quality products supplied, even a small bag containing toothbrush and shaver are supplied for those who do not want to carry toiletries through the airport. Cleanliness of the whole hotel is to a high level and maintained at that standard 24/7.We did have a couple of nights of rain whilst in Barcelona, umbrellas were available from reception if you chose to brave the weather. I can however highly recommend the hotel bar for a great night with wonderful staff who can make any cocktail you desire, or even ones you have never tried before. We were entertained with these skills by the wonderful Andrea and Miguel, very talented and professional team H10, we hope to see them both there next time we visit.We are really looking forward to a return visit and hope to spend more time on the rooftop pool area, to enjoy the stunning views, weather permitting.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best hotel I have stayed in!We have just returned from a 2 night stay in the H10 Madison, what can I say other than the staff make this the best hotel my husband has ever stayed in, and he spends 20 weeks of the year in them around the world. Everyone we have come into contact with has been exceptional, from check in, to the bar on the roof, breakfast and the pool guy, we couldn’t have asked for more! The hotel is very central, easy access to everything you would want to do. The breakfast had an amazing amount of choice, plus a menu of cooked to order options. You could add a glass of champagne to it as well!The menu on the roof terrace was varied and well priced, the Caesar salad was very good. We tried to work our way through the gins on offer but ran out of time!If there’s anything slightly negative to say it’s, ask for a room with a view ( the internal courtyard isn’t that pretty ) we booked a double room, and ended up with two singles pushed together ( made up as singles, not a double ) and while the complimentary Nespresso machine is a lovely touch for coffee drinkers, the lack of a kettle left me without an option for the tea I always carry. Think the bathroom window could do with some sort of blind as well, with the light on I imagine you are sharing more than you bargained for with the neighbours! Even with these small things I would be back for another stay in a heartbeat, and would throughly recommend to anyone. It’s a credit to the brand.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was a little concerned about going to Spain for the reason that I do not speak Spanish but when I arrived at the hotel everyone was very welcoming and extremely helpful. my five children all had a fantastic time. They are 5, 7,9, 10 and 12 years old and were never bored once. This is a very family friendly place which is perfect for kids of any age. The pool was very fun and my kids made a lot of friends there. The staff was wonderful and very helpful. Especially this one foxy pool boy he really made my stay enjoyable!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is fantastic. The location is perfect. Right next to Barcelona Cathedral and walkable to so many lovely places. The staff here without exception are perfect. Helpful, knowledgeable, happy, just brilliant. Can’t fault anything about this wonderful hotel.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a great Hotel with one of the best locations in Barcelona, in the Gothic Quarter close to everything, the staff are great so helpful even before we got there via email arranged a tapas walking tour for the night we came in so we didn't have to go looking for dinner and the rooftop bar great view of the church and staff again great I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel if we go back to Barcelona which we hope to I would say here
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was nicely appointed; room was very spacious and comfortable, with added benefits such as convenient USB ports (not special plugs needed for charging phones); and excellent soundproofing. Even though we were on the first floor, room was quiet--could not hear any street noises while the windows were closed. Also, they had a great breakfast. Last but not least, the staff was superb--friendly, helpful and accommodating.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was clean, location in the gothic quarter was perfect we walked to restaurants, shops. Close the gothic Cathedral. The view from the roof top is amazing. The people in reception were excellent . Love it!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I’m not usually one to write reviews but felt we had to here! Just returned home from a 5 night stay and received exceptional service throughout, we had a lovely double room on the seventh floor which was serviced by a very efficient cleaning team. Loved the double rainfall shower! We were greeted with a bottle of cava and birthday cake to celebrate my husbands birthday-nice touch. Any requests we had were met within minutes, I’ve stayed at many five star hotels in my time but the guest attentiveness and speed was second to none I have experienced! We used this hotel as our base to attend the Formula One weekend and was ideally located for us, 15 minute walk to our coach transfers and strolling distance of many cafes and bars at night. We utilised the pool and roof top terrace on our last day and what a fabulous place this was to relax. Room service was fast and tasty, personally I would have liked a little more choice. My husband raised a small concern with maintenance in the room next door to us starting while we were still in bed, this was more than resolved by the front of house team with our additional items charged to our room over the course of our stay removed free of charge to apologise - such a lovely gesture that was not expected! The morning we left we received a warm goodbye and also offered breakfasts to go free of charge because of the maintenance again. Thank you! If we return to Barcelona I wouldn’t hesitate booking here again. Well done to all your staff for the work they do, a great team!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This excellent hotel places you exactly where you want to be to see this wonderful city. Rooms are clean and comfortable! Staff is friendly and helpful! Don’t miss going to the 8th floor Bar to see the panoramic view from there.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved the junior suite, it was perfect. Housekeeping was very effective. I would change only one thing - proper duvet cover for the double duvet, please.. Breakfast was really really nice, I loved the omelettes and different sides you could order. Staff was very friendly and professional. The roof terrace with the bar was wonderful.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We visited the H10 Madison in April for the second time in six months.We where there in October and had such a good time we just had to go back. Not only is this hotel fresh and modern it is charmimg and a romantic hotel as well. We where greeted as we came in and as last time offered a nice glass of chilled cava, my wife loves it. The Staff are very welcoming and it was good to meet Jesus again he is a great asset to the team always on hand and attentive. Also thanks to carol and victoria. we enjoyed our stay immensely. The hotel is right in the gothic area so if you looking for a great hotel with a little romance look no further. Regards Gary and Joanne from England.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent a great weekend in Barcelona with my husband at H10 Madison , so glad we chose this hotel . 100 yards from cathedral in gothic quarter , fabulous location and walking distance to plenty upmarket bars, cafes and restaurants . Hotel staff all friendly , our room was lovely with 2 small ornate balconies and we got back to room one night to find a bottle of prosecco and delicious chocolate covered strawberries as we were celebrating a special occasion . We will definitely return , also fabulous rooftop cocktail bar and pool with amazing views
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We enjoyed the hotel but don't think its the 5 star rating on trip advisor. Its perfectly situated close by the cathedral. Staff are polite but maybe its because we were there over a weekend as service felt a little slow. One day room was not cleaned or water replaced. Breakfast is very nice with lots of choice but poached eggs I ordered were overcooked and waffle overcooked too which is one of reasons I felt perhaps insufficient staff, overworked perhaps? Nice large bed, plenty hot water and we had a nice little balcony. So much to see in Barcelona place is amazing.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We have stayed @ other hotels but the Maddison has by far the Best Staff & service they are always happy to help & nothing is too much trouble. Especially the restaurant & bar staff Alex, Domingo & Jesus are just wonderful & a credit to the hotel!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I looked at hotels for quite some time before making my selection, and after staying at the H10 Madison, I know that I made the right decision. The location was perfect because it was only a few minutes walk to the Cathedral, Gothic Quarter, shopping, and La Rambla, plus it was close enough to the beach, La Sagrada Familia, and Parc Guell that the cost of a taxi was incredibly reasonable. The inside of the hotel was very clean, the view from the terrace was great, and the staff of the hotel were the best I have ever seen.Breakfast downstairs is a little pricy, but worth every penny because the food and juices are fresh and the employees work hard to ensure you are satisfied with your meal. Jesus made me a hot chocolate, which is not on the menu, and it was unlike anything I have ever had before. The waffles were by far the best waffles I have ever eaten, and I can tell you that I have eaten a lot of waffles.Also, the staff who cleaned the rooms were swift and efficient, and came multiple times throughout the day to make sure everything was perfect for us. They came once to clean, once to water the flowers, and once to turn on the lights by the bed in the evening so that it was not dark when we arrived back to the room. Somewhere along the way, they also left little chocolates by the pillows that were quite tasty.With all things considered, including price, location, service, hotel furnishings, and cleanliness, this may have been the best hotel we have ever stayed at. The pillows could have been a little better, but I do not hold that against them because I am a picky pillow person. If considering the H10 Madison, do not look any further, this is the one for you!
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just returned from a fantastic stay at H10 Madison. I’d never heard of this hotel chain before and now I’m ready to stay with them again and again. The location was central and walkable. The lobby was inviting and comfortable. The room was clean, quiet and warm. The rooftop pool and bar were great. Easy to get to via the bus from the airport.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a fantastic hotel, direct in the middle of the gothic area. A great base in which to visit all the sights. The staff were brilliant from the moment we entered the Hotel the girls at the desk could not do enough for us, they helped plan our stay and the sights we wanted to see, and booked our tickets which was a great help. All the staff were brilliant throughout the hotel, and i would definitely recommend this hotel to others.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a junior suite at the H10 Madison for a family of four. The room was made up of a king size bed and a sofa bed, a small desk and chair and a large sized bathroom. Having stayed in many hotels in Europe, this was a great size for a family. The kids had plenty of room to play when we were in our room and we didn't feel like it was cramped. The hotel was very clean and the staff were very pleasant. Our kids loved the marshmallow jars in reception, as did quite a few adult guests, which was a nice extra touch. The breakfast on offer was amazing! There was so much variety from the usual continental breakfast to cooked breakfasts based on your personal preferences. The restaurant itself was very nice too and the staff were very attentive. The hotel is in the perfect location, 5 - 10 minutes walk to La Rambla and Placa Catalunya, so you can have the hustle and bustle when you want it but then you can come back to the quieter area where the hotel is located. We had booked a bus tour with Bus Turistic and the bus stop was a few minutes walk from the hotel, so this was perfect as we never needed any taxis other than getting to and from the airport. There are lots of restaurants nearby so we walked to dinner every evening too. We visited the hotel rooftop bar on our last day and were very pleasantly surprised, the seating area and pool were very clean and the views were amazing. If the weather had been warmer we definitely would have got into the pool!I would highly recommend the H10 Madison to anyone visiting Barcelona. Having stayed at the Grand Marina Hotel (World Trade centre) last time we visited Barcelona, which is rated as being a 5 star hotel (and it was), I would be inclined to say that we found this hotel as being better due to the location and general feel of the hotel, it's much better value for your money too.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel is beautiful. Staff was outstanding. Rooftop bar and pool was great and relaxing. Rooms are spacious and accommodating. Loved this hotel. Lobby had water, champagne and snacks available all day.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A 4 day stay at this hotel recently was a very nice one. 40 euro taxi from airport with late checkin in, not a problem and desk attendant courteous. Room itself was quiet with double glaze window despite being next to street. No temperature issues. Complimentary water each day and state of room was excellent with now wear or tear. Enough space to lay cases and very happy, only gripe is very limited English TV but you aren't there to watch TV! There is an 8th floor pool and bar and this is great on a sunny day although not really on my trip due to temperature. I didnt check if pool was heated. The only other nuisance was breakfast not included, and at 23 euro its a bit. in saying this I had it each day and some of best cooked breakfast ive ever had! The staff were very good and remembered my preference on day 2 (perhaps I had odd breakfast!). There are two train stations in opposite directions, Jaume 1 (closer, about 5 mins walk) and Urqinaona with get you onto the easily useable train lines. The hotels closest landmark is the Cathedral right next to it. The tourist buses depart near this so you can hop on and hop off (advisable as some landmarks are a fair trek in busy Barcelona!). The bathroom and shower was well appointed and spacious and the Internet worked fine. Would happily stay here again
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed in the H10 Madison with my partner for a weekend break. The hotel is in a fantastic location near the Cathedral, walking distance to many sights such as the Picasso Museum, and a short walk from the Metro. We arrived in the evening, following a quick and easy taxi ride from the airport and were greeted by a friendly receptionist, who offered us a complimentary glass of Cava. As we had joined the H10 club we were also given vouchers for free cocktails. We were assigned a room on the top floor, at the front of the hotel. Unfortunately I am a very light sleeper and despite the excellent double glazing, had problems sleeping due to slight road noise (mainly from mopeds). When I asked if would move rooms the next morning, the staff were happy to oblige and asked us to pack our suitcases and leave them in the room and they would be moved to a new room while we were out for the day- very convenient.When we returned that evening our bags had indeed been moved to a different room, which looked out into a courtyard. While being slightly smaller than the previous room, it was amazingly quiet- no noise from either outside or other hotel rooms and I slept wonderfully. The staff at reception were kind enough even to check I had slept better the next morning after changing rooms. The hotel itself is stylish, light and airy throughout. It has a beautiful roof terrace with a plunge pool (we didn’t use the pool as it was a little chilly in February), and the reception area is well furnished with interesting artwork and comfortable sofas. As the hotel is an old and characterful building, all the rooms are different shapes and sizes. The rooms are beautifully decorated in light colours and wood, with good quality mattresses and bedding and enough storage space for clothes and suitcases. Our second room had a cute balcony which overlooked the courtyard. The bathrooms were luxurious, with robes and sippers provided and good quality Rituals toiletries and amenity kits. Nespresso machines are provided in all rooms- I would have preferred a kettle. The reception desk were unable to provide a kettle but the bar staff were happy to provide a pot of hot water and a tea cup. Breakfast is served in the restaurant and was fantastic. I enjoyed choosing a different freshly made hot dish every day from the menu (especially the delicious waffles), and the selection of cold food was superb. The breakfast room was never busy and staff were friendly and efficient. We used our free drinks vouchers on the last night and I enjoyed a well made mojito. This was our first time staying in a H10 hotel and I would definitely return. All the hotel staff were genuinely kind and friendly, and the hotel was well run and provided a lovely relaxing base for our city break.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed 4 nights for my business trip and I cannot complaint about anything. Its new hotel and the location is also nice.I could visit various places and shops in walking distance. Breakfast was good indeed. I want to stay again!출장으로 방문하여 4박을 하였다. 정말 너무나 만족스러운 호텔이었다. 새 호텔이라 정말 깨끗하였고 위치도 너무나 좋았다. 수많은 장소들을 걸어다닐 수 있었다. 조식도 정말 맛있고 훌륭했다
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was in a great location for access to restaurants and site seeing. The lobby was comfortable and water and Cava were always available. The hotel and restaurant staff were friendly, helpful, and provided great service. The room was quiet, well appointed and spacious. The roof top pool and restaurant service was an additional way to be right in the heart of downtown but in a private oasis.
hotelName:
6    H10 Madison
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very smart, modern hotel. Good location close to everything but far enough away to be quiet at night. Would recommend this Hotel to anyone wanting to explore the city sights. Rooms were very modern if not a little small....but you only sleep there.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved Hotel Rec. The pool (it's small but we loved it) provided the perfect environment to rest and recoup after several HOT days walking around Barcelona and taking in the sites. The location was perfect for us - just a few steps from Arc de Triomf, where we caught the train for a day-long tour in Penedes one day. It's also walking/running distance to the beach and lots of other sites. We thoroughly enjoyed the cocktail classes at the end of the day - it gave us a chance to chat with other guests and the staff, exchange restaurant recommendations, and get a few free drinks on the house. :) The breakfast was amazing - so many options and beautifully presented. We also enjoyed an evening of live Catalan music during our stay. For the price, I thought Hotel Rec was an incredible deal. So glad we went with this hotel instead of the many others we looked at.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our sons booked the hotel for a pressie, we had no idea what to expect. It was lovely, staff great, room great would definitely go back!The restaurants around the hotel were reasonably priced and the food was lovely, we never had a bad meal, the restaurant next door was a great experience it looks expensive but for a nice night out it isn’t bad at all.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Staff were incredibly helpful, great location ( literally 2 mins walk from Arc and everywhere is walkable) and rooms were clean and modern. The additional free activities such as cocktail masterclass were a bonus and the views from the pool and lounge were lovely to eat breakfast from. I would highly recommend, no complaints.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We arrived quite late (1.am) because of a delayed flight. This was no problem due to the 24h reception. We got a small and modern room which was very clean and nice(like expected). The breakfast in the 7th floor was really good and you can choose to eat outside by the pool if you like. The breakfast had everything we wanted and the atmosphere was chilled and relaxed. No stress. We only stayed for 2 nights so this was a great place to be for that amount of time. For longer visits I would recommend a larger room with a fridge etc. (Dont know if this hotel has that kind of room). The location of the hotel is great. Close to «everything», but still pretty quiet. We did not hear any noices from the streets or other rooms. The AC was working great as well. After our checkout we had to kill some hours before taking the train to our next destination. The hotel has a great system to store luggage for these situations.Kind regards,Morten
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couldn't have asked for anymore from this hotel! We accidently booked to single beds instead of a double and they managed to change it for us with no problems. The hotel is in a great location for sight seeing, eating and drinking. The daily activities in the lounge were a great touch. Brilliant choice of food for breakfast as well. Would definitely stay here again!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel has this amazing vibe that makes you happy ever since you step inside! We got huge smiles from the staff all the way to the entrance! Such a welcoming place, you won’t find a place that is more welcoming than this! They recommended things that are worth to see, explained everything very well and we also got a welcome drink The room was so beautiful, exatly made for besties or couple as the bathroom is pretty much within the rooms, you gotta see that! The rooftop with the pool is another huge plus to this hotel. It is quite small but it doesn’t feel too crowded even if it is full of people. Inside this 7th floor there is a breakfast served which was absolutely amazing as well! So.. to sum it up, we had a wonderful time. If I wouldn’t want to see Barcelona, I would stay in the hotel all day long every day♥️
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A friend and I took a week and a half vacation to Europe, splitting the time between Paris and Barcelona, with Barcelona being the 2nd half of the trip. The hotel we stayed at in Paris was equally nice but more formal and a tiny room. Hotel Rec’s rooms are still small by American standards, but the design is very open and well done. We never felt confined. There is a small area to hang clothes, but, yes, as other reviews mentioned, no place to really put clothes otherwise. But with 2 ladies sharing the same space, we had no problems. There were 2 luggage holders that we were able to set our suitcases on and easily work out of. There is also a desk that could be used for clothes if desired. The bed was really comfortable, nice and big, and the shower was great. There are coffee and tea capabilities in the room, but you can also get a decent cup of coffee from the vending machine for 1-1/2 Euros. Our room was located on the 5th floor street-side, and we loved it. We could open the window and get fresh air and see and hear the local street noises, which we enjoyed, or close it and not hear a peep.Upon arriving the first day, as most reviewers stated, we were greeted by 2 very friendly team members and offered our choice of a beverage. The very nice female got us all checked in and gave us a map and went over the highlights with us. We went up to the rooftop area for a snack and a drink. Yum! The nachos and fresh guacamole and the hummus were delicious! The views are nice—all windows— and the furniture comfy. The servers were friendly. The pool is tiny but nice for lounging. The location of Hotel Rec is great. Right in the Gothic Quarter with easy access to the places to eat, transportation, the Picasso museum, the beach, shopping, flamenco dancing, a local market where you can pick up and small personal or food items that you might need, etc. There is a city tour bus that had a stop super close. And if you do need a taxi, yes you have to walk a few feet to the main road to access it, but it’s super close as well. We went to Harlem Jazz Club, which was about mile and half away and walked home from there at 3 a.m. and felt safe. We had debated between Hotel Jazz and Hotel Rec, and ultimately went with Rec because it was less costly. We found out they are owned by the same company and have similar standards. Rec takes pride in being the “friendly hotel.” Which they definitely are. The one front desk team member that really stood out throughout our stay was Joel. He was kind, sincere, helpful and made you feel as if he personally cared that you were taken care of. And all of the team speaks English, if that’s something you need. I would definitely stay here again! Don’t hesitate if you are considering it. :)
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location great. Staff great. Breakfast great. Pool super small and closed at 8? In an adults only hotel? After a long hot day we just wanted to relax a bit in the pool but nope closed. Lots of bars and restaurants near by. Very clean modern rooms with great sized beds! Wish they had a full closet to hang a dress in though. Roof top bar GREAT drinks! No fridge in the room so no way to keep any of your own drinks or water cold. Had to buy a can of Coke from vending machine that charged over 2 euro for one can
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our arrival was early since the cruise ship dropped us in Barcelona at 8am. The receptionist were very attentive, welcoming and able to check us in this time as the had a room available. Also they provided us with information about the neighborhood and activities that day. Helpful, intuitive and friendly are the words that pop up when I think of the first contact with the staff. Throughout our stay this was the constant attitude of all staff. The room was of a good size, but with little cupboard space. Coffee and tea making facilities, rain shower, build in blue tooth speakers, perfect free Wifi, very big and comfortable bed and blackout curtains. All in a contemporary design. The hotel is situated in the gothic neighborhood and from the hotel you can easily walk anywhere. The breakfast buffet is of good quality and very sufficient. Upon checkout they stored our luggage in a locker of which we got the key card, so very safe. As a final gesture of hospitality we got two vouchers for a drink on the rooftop terrace (with sunbathing chairs and a small pool).
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this was a nice and modern hotel in Barcelona. The location was great with a lot of bars and restaurants within walking distance. The room is not huge but is perfectly fine with a good shower and is kept clean. All the staff we encountered were very friendly and accommodating.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We flew into BCN, took the airport bus to the center of town, and walked to the REC. Paola greeted us warmly (in English, our first language), showed us to the gummy-bears while she completed our paperwork, and made sure we were rehydrated with cold water and beer after the walk. Our room featured very clever use of space, including a sliding mirror that doubled as a shower-wall so the sleeping guest could rest without glaring bathroom light. The rooftop poolside breakfast offered all the hot and cold food we could want and prepared us for a day of walking around this delightful ancient and modern city. A red-line metro stop at Trionfo was just a few minutes' walk away, for both in-town metro services and connections to the train to France.REC staff even helped us reserve a last-minute table at the adjacent Fismuler restaurant, which provided a free bottle of wine to REC clients. We now consider REC our Barcelona base whenever we are in town.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location. Within walking distance of tapas bars, restaurants, La Rambla, markets and museums. Also convenient to bus and metro stops for easy access to attractions that are farther away. The hotel staff are very friendly and extremely helpful. Breakfast buffet has something for everyone. They even have nightly events such as beer tasting, cocktail making and tapas crawls.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved our two nights here. Check in was great, especially accomodating us with an early check in & a beer! We loved the free master classes in the evening with Monica. Super big comfy bed! And such a great location.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We arrived at the hotel four hours early, and Alex was very helpful! He stored our luggage, provided us with a map, and highlighted the sights and the route we should take to visit each one. He also gave us a locals perspective on questions about what we should or shouldn't do in the city, as well as where we should eat. The room was fantastic and the biggest one we stayed in while in Europe. Alex was kind enough to bring us a bottle of Cava, as we were celebrating our honeymoon. We took part in the margarita class the hotel put on that night, and the following night we joined others on the terrace to enjoy great drinks, food and fireworks for the Summer Solstice celebration. Highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 4 nights in June and had a lovely time. The rooms are a good size, with a kettle and tea & coffee. The bed was very comfy and big! The hotel has a very modern/ minimalistic, fresh vibe to it. Upon arrival we were each given a free token for the vending machine to get some bottles of water which was nice.We had the buffet breakfast twice and it was perfect, had a good choice of everything and I liked the little glass bottles of fresh milkshake! I think the best thing about the hotel however is the staff, they are SO friendly and helpful, probably the best customer service I have received at a hotel.The only thing I can think of that could have made it even better would be if the rooftop pool was bigger as it's tiny. But then again most people who come to Barcelona aren't looking for a pool holiday so it wasn't really an issue.Would certainly come back here again!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, friendly staff and a hotel that looks like a hostel for adults. Everything new and stylish. My only complaint was that there was no refrigerator/microwave in the room, that would be great.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A very pleasant stay at this 18+ age limit hotel. Not only do this hotel feel closer to a 5 star than the 3 stars it has but the staff goes over and beyond to assist and help you have a great stay in Barcelona. They arrange different activities that are great value or free. Great internet connection, Bluetooth speakers in the room, connecting restaurant gives you a free bottle of wine if you book through the reception. Clean and comfortable bedrooms. Small rooftop bar and “pool” that is more for cool down than swimming but great views of the city. Had a great “tapas tour”. One of the most welcoming hotels I have been to. Top 5 of 500.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Hotel Rec in Barcelona for 4 nights and loved the location. It’s easy to get anywhere in Barcelona. The staff is great, room are well designed despite being on the small size. Breakfast on the rooftop is yummy. Overall a great stay in a great city.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What can I say? We had an absolute blast here. Loved Barcelona as a city - we walked everywhere and enjoyed getting lost in the little streets full of character and history. Hotel Rec was perfect for us. Fab location, modern, clean, and overall welcoming. There was a real mix of guests, and all appeared to be enjoying their stays. I would definitely recommend this hotel. Big shout out to Alex who checked us in, grabbed us an ice cold beer, and sat to talk through a map of the city with some recommendations. What a knowledgeable man, and he seemed to remember us whenever he saw us and always checked we had all we needed. Also to Serena, who held a wonderful craft beer masterclass. She certainly knows her beers and tells a wonderful tale. And lastly Joel, who assisted us on checkout and wanted to make sure we’d enjoyed our stay. The rooftop pool and lounge was perfect to grab some rays and have a chill out before setting off to explore again. It was our first time to Barcelona, hopefully not the last, and I would not hesitate to stay here again.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fantastic location as was able to walk everywhere. Very friendly and helpful staff and room was very clean and spacious. Would definitely stay here again on a return trip to Barcelona and would definitely recommend the hotel.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fancy and comfortable hotel, with a very nice roof top. Excellent service, delicious breakfast and good coctails, but keep away from the coffee. The rooms are clean and the employers are nice. The location of the hotel is superb.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place to relax and take in the city! Short from the Metro and Arc de Triomf! The views were The rooms were quiet with a feel of zen. The staff was helpful and I was greeted with a glass of wine!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Rec Hotel was a pleasant surprise. It's very modern and hip, but welcoming. Check in and check out were a breeze. Staff all spoke English, and were knowledgeable and helpful. Room rates are on the high side, but good value for the money, especially since it is Adults Only. Booking online with the hotel was easy. The location is close to the Metro, the Arc de Triomf, the Aquarium and many interesting stores and restaurants in the Old Quarter. We walked to Las Ramblas, although it was a bit of a hike. The rooftop terrace was an unexpected bonus - we sat in the sun with our devices and marvelled at the deep blue skies and gorgeous skyline. There was a free activity (tastings, food samples, etc.) almost every day. The rooms are compact but very comfortable. There was no fridge available in the room (no space). Be aware that there is limited vehicle access - the taxi will drop you off on the main street nearby and you have to walk a few hundred meters across a paved plaza to the hotel. There are lots of supermercados and restaurants nearby - you can buy baked goods, yogurt and fruit. Some eateries do not open until late but there are others who cater to tourist tastes for early dining. The neighbourhood is fascinating and the streets are very clean. We felt safe day and night - there's lots of good lighting and there are usually people around.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Fun, happening hotel on the edge of the Gotic district in Barcelona. Reasonable sized rooms, with a huge bed. Bathroom kind of merges with the bedroom, which is ok, but really intrudes into the room space. Only fault was there was no place to put your suitcases. Not great when there's usually 2 persons in a room with at least 1 case and one piece of hand luggage each. Maybe we were meant to share the giant bed with the suitcases?? Rooms had opening windows, which was lovely to make a change from air con. Breakfast served on top floor was good, with a number of different choices, including gf options. Would be better if staff used gloves to handle food though. Pool was very small, wouldn't fit many people! Service was warm and friendly. Metro station was around the corner, lots of bike hire places close. Within walking distance from La Rambla through the lanes of the Gotic area with plenty of eating and drinking options along the way. My opinion is to avoid the touristy area of La Rambla and find an eatery in this area.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here 4 nights in February 2019. the rooms were fun, well designed and comfortable, bright and clean. Staff were really friendly and the breakfast in the roof top restaurant were excellent. From here we were able to walk just about anywhere and enjoy El Born and the other areas of BCN. My daughter lives here but her flat is very tiny and very noisy - As Barcelona can be. Hotel Rec was great in that it was not full of hen parties and touring stags out on the lash. BEing over near the Arc De Triomf it was far enough away from Las Ramblas to be a really lovely place to experience a slightly less hustling, bustling "touristy" time. I would stay here again
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: central, relaxed, very nice rooftop terrace, live music, good air conditioning in room, very friendly team, good breakfast, good restaurant with a little party towards closing time, everything you need
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the place to stay when you’re in Barcelona. Just a great, modern hotel with all the comforts one could hope for. The staff are friendly, relaxed and helpful, the breakfast is fantastic and the location is great with El Born and Gothic Quarter right outside the door.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located just next to the Arc de Triomf, this is an excellent hotel that ticks all the boxes- comfort, service, well equipped rooms, location and especially personal warmth! At the time of check-in, they serve a welcome drink of your choice ( wine, beer, soft drink) and clarify all aspects related to your stay. They also have events every evening for hotel guests- so we had a beer tasting session on the day we landed, and the next evening there was a Beefeater gin evening ( which we missed, as we were at the Sagrada Familia).Rooms are modern, very well equipped with tea/coffee making facility, TV and bluetooth speakers. Wifi had good bandwidth too. I will only recommend they have a mini-refrigerator as well.Breakfast at their comfortable 7th floor lounge( with expansive views of the neighbourhood Gothic quarter) had extensive choices of juices, beverages, yoghurt, fresh fruits, sausages, cheese, ham, condiments, and hot items like scrambled eggs, bacon, fried rice... You can also get eggs made as per your preference.Will definitely consider staying with them again.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Cool hotel, funky ambiance, perfect location, superb staff, great value for money. Yes, the rooms are on the small side but for a busy city break, this was irrelevant. Loved the breakfast and the roof terrace. The staff had their challenges with our party (mislaid bag, illness...) and were always extremely personable and genuinely cared.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My partner and I stayed at Hotel Rec for 3 nights.The stay was quite enjoyable except for the size of the room.The room would have been fine if it was not for the very big bed that took up most of the space.We were not able to move around the room at the same time.For this reason I give only 3 points to this hotel.The breakfast was good whith cold and hot options,good selection of fresh fruit and dairy products as well.The hotel is very clean and front desk provides a good service.The location is very good too.If the room/bed size proportions were different I would've been much happier with this hotel.I would reccomend this hotel as the service,location,cleanenes and breakfast are good.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I just got back from Spain and if you plan to stay in Barcelona, I would highly recommend Hotel Rec Barcelona. The moment we walked in the door we were welcomed and offered champagne, soft drinks, etc. Alex (go) checked us in then sat down with us. He showed us a local map and circled points of interest, explained transportation and was very helpful. Another staff member,Christina helped us with our travel plans and booked train tickets for us. The motel itself is great, with nice quiet rooms, a small pool and great lounge area on the top floor with city views, great breakfast and a super location. We walked to 90% of the sights we wanted to see. We would definitely stay here again!!!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A really nice, clean and modern hotel. The customer service is great, they welcome me with a drink and there is a bar with candies. Isn't it amazing? :) . It is great to be in an Hotel only for adults where there is no kids. The hotel is well located near a metro station and the Arc of triump. You are closed to almost all major attractions by walking distance. I will definitively come back to this hotel!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent 7 nights in this quirky but trendy hotel with excellent staff and great amenities. Great location to explore Barcelona. Felt welcome from the time we arrived until we left.Great rooftop bar and pool, although the pool area is quite small. Fun activities most nights provided by the hotel such as cocktail making classes and beer tasting gave the opportunity to mix with other guests. Special thanks to Marina and Serina for hosting these and making them fun. They also have art and music nights with live music and artist on site. Great fun and great vibe. Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who likes a bit of fun and mixing with other guests. Would certainly stay here again if we get back to Barcelona.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 4 nights at this beautiful hotel in the perfect location. The hotel was 5 minutes walk away from Arc de Triomphe and Sants station. The rooms are very trendy and comfortable and the roof top lounge was just amazing with a view of the city. The highlight for me was the evening entertainment which is different every day from cocktail masterclass to live painting. The Reception staff were very helpful with guiding us on metro and train journeys to the attractions. I would highly recommend this hotel. The only criticism I have is their restaurant did not have much choice for vegetarian.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent, we only have wedding words Pra the hotel staff in general, dedicating a special paragraph to Mr. Marc of the 7th. Apartment that in addition to serving in his specialty, also provided us with his tourism knowledge to make the most of our stay maximum. But all the conference, staff cleaning staff and very especially to BREACKFAST, very grateful
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Brief overnight in Barcelona returning from a trip to India. This is a really nicely done boutique hotel which combines innovative design with comfort. It's also very well located in Barcelona in a neighborhood with a lot of charm and character. The basic room is on the smallish side, but it's so well designed it doesn't feel cramped or claustrophobic. The beds are huge and extremely comfortable. The top floor lounge for breakfast and relaxing is beautiful, all glass with lovely views, with a nice outdoor pool up there as well. Slept well and would repeat and recommend.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice modern clean hotel. Great breakfast with panoramic views of the city. Our only complaint was no wash cloths. They laughed when we asked for some and said use a hand towel. They don’t have any! So is this a thing? No wash cloths? Lol!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a great stay in this hotel. The staff spoke English and was easy to understand and super helpful! They had a place to store our luggage while we waited to check in the hotel and for when we checked out so we could still explore. It was located right across the street of the Arco De Triunfo De Barcelona and within walking distance to the Zoo and park.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really wonderful experience and especially I loved the breakfast part every morning:) nice view and nice food! I already miss this so much and I want to visit there again. And every services were so good and kind staffs and cute every single their design in the room was very much enjoyable!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great small boutique hotel! The staff is very friendly and helpful. The location is good and easy to get in/out of. Hotel arranged for taxis and they were always on time. Would stay here again. Thanks!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel has style, but when it comes to hospitality it is definitely lacking. My new husband and I came here for our last stop on our honeymoon and they gave us a room with 2 twin beds, saying that they couldn’t do anything else for us. The beds were put together, so it ended up working out...but it wasn’t ideal. Also, the pool is a miniature pool, only good enough for a toddler - even though it’s an adults only hotel. The depth is literally 70cm => 27 inches. The lounge around the pool actually serves pretty good food. The cheeseburger was so good that we attempted to order a second, but there was a master mixology class - in which the bartender and cook were teaching...so no one could cook the food. The next evening we tried to order a cheeseburger again, and they weren’t serving it. The bartender didn’t even seem to care at all that we were bothered by that...but that carelessness seems to be the norm in Barcelona from what I’ve gathered. All in all, it’s a pretty basic hotel in a pretty good location.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just back from our stay at the Rec Barcelona.Everyting is great. The minute you walk in staff greets you. Everybody is very friendly !Nice rooms, very clean, modern, with every comfort you need. Not very big, but thats alright if you're always walking throug Barcelona.Great breakfast in a fine atmosphere. Even several tables outside with a fantastic view over Barcelona !
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great hotel, very helpful staff (ask for Alex Gomez, he's fantastic). Room was very clean and comfortable, good breakfast, great location. Nice roof bar and pool/lounge too.Right across the street from the Arc, close to Los Ramblas.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been to Barcelona many time and always stay somewhere different, this time we stayed in El Born always a fun area, we group of 8 adults had a fabulous stay at the Hotel Rec, the hotel is modern in style, the bed is very comfy, the shower is nice and powerful, hairdryer etc in room. From the moment we arrived we were made very welcome, we were offered a complimentary glass of wine, bubbles or beer on arrival, the reception team were great through out our stay, all questions answered and helped with nearby restaurant tips like Ginettes which was very nice and only 3 minute walk from hotel. Fismuler right next door to the hotel was also very nice both need to be booked if you’re in a group as very busy. The bar staff, Serene and Monica were super. The Hotel Rec has a free drink tasting master classes early evening each night is a fun touch, although we didn’t attend we did see a few of them. Breakfast was included and had a reasonable choice. Pool is more like a plunge cool off pool not a swimming pool and deck areas are small, good view of city from 7th floor. Would definitely recommend and stay here again.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You should be able to tell from the pictures that the rooms in the hotel are very modern and can be small. However, we found it worth it given the location and the views from the breakfast/bar area (the people were all very nice as well). Take the option with the breakfast included, it's well worth it to start each morning off with the large arrangement they have and some great views. We found the location great since we didn't want to be by La Rambla. There were several really good restaurants and many walkable sites. The hotel rooms are a little more modern and smaller than I prefer, but I knew that going in so it was exactly what I thought it was going to be.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The breakfast was well worth the small additional cost when we booked through Expedia. Being in an all adult facility was wonderful for being on vacation and there was very little noise heard from other rooms. The location of the hotel is great too and has a Metro station less than a 5 minute walk away.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here with my wife. Very artsy. Great bed. Fabulous breakfast. Perfect location to explore Gothic Quarter. Lots of very good restaurants within a block or two. We like the Italian one 2 blocks away. The Arc de Triump (?) makes easy landmark.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel REC is well located - Placa Catalunya is a 15 min walk from here. The Hotel’s decor shows great taste which is reflected in the Reception, corridors and breakfast areas. The staff were efficient and friendly.The room we stayed in cost us a bomb (Euros 181) for a single night’s stay and was ridiculously small. The room was definitely well organised, as it had to be, given its size. The result was a room that was completely cramped for space. The toilet and bath were separate, which was the saving grace of the room. We don’t understand if the high rate we paid was due to peak traffic - we were at Barcelona at the time of the Championship League football match. However in the past, we have stayed in different hotels in the city during such peak weeks and this has to be the smallest room we have ever stayed in. Breakfast was served at the attic which was large, very well ventilated and offered good views of the city and outdoor seating. The breakfast was a large spread with fresh and preserved fruits, muesli, fresh juices, breads, croissants, cheeses, eggs and a very large spread of desserts! The staff were friendly and helpful.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I’ve been to Barcelona a few times on business and for leisure over the years and the Hotel Rec by far is one of the top places I have stayed. Right from the reception where we were met by the friendly and very helpful staff, the experience was awesome. Great room with a huge bed, nice view (and, yes, the window does open for those of you who like the feeling of not being caged in a hotel room with no option to get non-air conditioned air in) and cool shower and a separate toilet. The rooftop restaurant with a 360 views of BCN and a pool is fab. Breakfast was delicious and with plenty of healthy options (loved the chia and coconut and fresh orange juice). Definitely have to go back to use the pool).Location is also a great plus. Right next to the Arc de Triomf you are within easy walk to the hip Born Area through the park as well as Gothic Quarter, Las Ramblas, Barceloneta etc. Wholeheartedly recommend the Hotel Rec and hope to return soon.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is excellent from any perspective. We visit many hotels, but here you are a family member. We will sure go ONLY to the Rec Hotel when we visit next time. The location is perfect, the rooms are perfect. Breakfast is amazing. Its always best to take your room with breakfast esp. at that hotel.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The REC Hotel was a perfect home base in Barcelona. The location is close to many restaurants, shops, grocery stores, and metro/bus stops. After a busy day of sightseeing (many sites are also nearby), the hotel provided a place to regroup, either in our comfortable & quiet room; or upstairs in the bar/lounge with its large indoor seating area and outdoor patio, both with sweeping views of the city. (Consider taking part in their evening social activities. It's a great way to meet people.) The hotel is staffed by friendly and helpful people (*Jana, Joel, Alec, Marina*) who will make sure you are well taken care of. Highly recommend this hotel!
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is set in a beautiful part of Barcelona, with great access to all areas. The beach is a 20 minute walk, the park de guelle is a 40 minute walk and the arc de triomf is literally the other side of the hotel wall. The hotel has a modern feel to it and a good overall vibe, the rooms are very pleasant with a great sized power shower. The roof terrace bar is a fantastic place to take in the view of the whole city.The staff are very friendly and very helpful, particularly Jana at breakfast, she's very friendly and always up for a chat. Breakfast is fantastic, so much choice and everything tastes so fresh.I would highly recommened this hotel to any age group.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 3 nights in Hotel Rec. Everything went very smoothly and we were happy to be there. Excellent service, outstanding breakfast and cosy lounge & pool area on 7th floor. Our room was very nice and beds comfortable.
hotelName:
7    Hotel Rec Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: So glad I found this BnB. Location is awesome and the accommodations perfect. We stayed in the wooden room with a private bathroom across the hall. Breakfast was excellent and Jon was very informative. Too bad we were there for only two nights. Highly recommended
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Everything was great. The room was spacious and immaculate. The manager, Telma, and the owners, Kiko and Jon, were friendly and helpful regarding things to do, places to go, and restaurant recommendations. In the Eixample area, it was close to many things, including Sagrada Familia, Gracia, and Placa Catalunya. Metro stop was about 2 blocks away if you don’t want to walk to anything slightly further away. Breakfast each morning was simple, but also very good.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location of Barcelona BB cannot be beat. John and Kiki are amazing hosts, so much do that we have booked for a 3rd stay with them. Beautiful rooms, tastefully decorated and good breakfast. On my 2nd stay they even let us leave our luggage while we walked the Camino. It was do nice to have city clothes waiting for us in Barcelona after days of hiking. Stayed with them in 2015, 2017 and will again in May 2019. Repeat visitors... This speaks for itself!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: BarcelonaBB is the place to stay if you are looking for cleanliness, fabulous hosts, and wanting to stay in one of the best areas in Barcelona! All major attractions are within walking distance. The flat exudes warmth & culture...a home away from home feel!A word to the wise....book directly with the hosts on the BarcelonaBB B&B website versus Booking.com.Until next time BCN...
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was everything we had hoped for--clean, extremely well located, great communications, and wonderful wonderful staff.From the time we arrived until the time the taxi took us to the airport, we felt quite at home and very well cared for.Stay here!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here 3 nights. We had a wonderful stay. Telma greeted us and provided lots of helpful information. Breakfasts were served at a long common table and conversation is encouraged with other guests. I'm not particularly a morning person but even I enjoyed talking with other travelers exchanging stories - it was difficult to pull ourselves away from the table to start the day. Owner John was a perfect host. The bed is comfortable, the rooms are quiet, centrally located with restaurants and a market close by. You couldn't ask for more.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Spent 3 nights at BarcelonaBB. Jon, Kiki and Telma were very helpful before and during our stay, with plenty of suggestions. The property is in an excellent location for walking to all the main sights. We were very comfortable in the White Room and the breakfasts were excellent. It was good to meet other guests and swap stories and experiences. The property is beautifully decorated with lots of nice touches and decoration. You get the impression that you are personal guests in someone’s house. Will definitely stay again. Thanks for the welcome.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
