review_body: We stayed at BarcelonaBB at the end of a weeks long trip to Morocco & Spain, and what a lovely, wonderful place to end our trip! Our room was lovely and very comfortable, with a king size bed. The breakfasts were wonderful. The location is absolutely perfect, walking distance to everything you want to see (which helps keep you fit after all those wonderful tapas you will be eating!), and there are lots of wonderful small restaurants close by as well. But best of all are the wonderful people who make you feel as if they have invited you into their home: Jon & Kiku, the hosts; Telma, who greeted us upon arrival and was a wealth of information about everything; and the fabulous chef who made our wonderful breakfasts each morning (I never got her name, but I met her and she's just the kind of bright friendly person you want to see first thing in the morning, bearing plates of food that are delicious!). I couldn't have asked for more, and if I am ever in Barcelona this is the place I will stay! We had 4 wonderful nights, and enjoyed every one of them.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for 3 nights at the end of September, 2018.The Good - location was not real close, but still walkable to Sagrada Familia, Las Ramblas, block of Discord, Arc de Triompf, and Barri Gotic. Taxi's easily available when needed. Good restaurants (and variety) nearby. Concepcion Market is very close and fun to visit. Room was clean. Laid back vibe. Good communication prior to our stay and accommodated early check-in with no problem.Breakfast doesn't start until 9:00 am so early morning tours/departures will miss it (there is in-room coffee). Room wasn't spacious, but perfectly serviceable.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at Barcelonabb Bed and Breakfast for 2 nights and I have to say this is one of the best and friendliest places we have ever stayed. Excellent rooms and Breakfast is superb. All guests eating together at one table is a great idea.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We were lucky to be able to stay in this wonderful B&B in Barcelona. The location can't be beat. You are walking distance to the hop on/off bus, two Gaudi buildings and the Sagrada Familia. There are wonderful restaurants nearby.The rooms are spacious and located in a beautiful, old building. Free wifi, but we had a tough time until we figured out that the room we were in needed a different wifi connection. Quickly figured out after a text to the owners. No big deal.Breakfast was typical, but the owners are present and provide excellent recommendations and conversation. There is a taxi stand on the next block which would have been perfect had there been a taxi strike the day we were leaving. We had no idea! Our hosts took care of us, and graciously gave us a ride to the airport in their brand new car! We made our flight, but we simply would have been stuck had it not been for their help.Wonderful stay, hosts, room, and location. You really can't ask for more. Thank you for all your help and for a perfect stay in Barcelona!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We love Paris, always have...but if you can get to Barcelona, you will fall in love with this city and the great places you can stay...rivals Paris...we are still deciding our favorite. But...we do love Paris in the Springtime! Stay at this BB...perfect!.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Oh how I miss this place already! I stayed in BarcelonaBB for an entire week in June and it made my first time in Barcelona even more special. This beautiful bed and breakfast is centrally located to everything, a short 15 min walk, and I was at Sagrada Familia and other major city sites. I enjoyed waking up to a delicious breakfast every morning with warm and kind staff. My room was cleaned daily which is refreshing after a long day of walking. Kiku and John are wonderful hosts who provided great suggestions to maximize my time in Barcelona. I highly recommend this bed and breakfast to everyone looking for a charming home that is centrally located to everything. I look forward to returning, sooner than later!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for a week and were very comfortable with the attention and kind service of our hosts Jhon and Kiku and their staff. They made us feel like home. We recommend it for anyone that wants to be in a great location and be in a relaxed and kind environment.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location was convenient and phenomenal- walking distance to absolutely everything. Breakfast is provided and it was delicious. The room i stayed in was the blue room off of Mallorca. It was WAY more space than any hotel room. I went by myself and was given AMAZING local spots and suggestions as to what to do. I straight up discovered the entire city by foot, ate within blocks of my flat and rested comfortably. If I had any questions, the hosts were accommodating and insightful in their recommendations.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I'm sometimes a bit wary staying in bed&breakfasts(s) but everything in BarcelonaBB B&B deserves superlatives: the location, setting, room comfort, cleanliness, breakfast, and above all the hosts and staff who were wonderful. Let me just bullet point why we like B&B:-• Friendly - nice places are nothing without nice people. Our gracious host showed us to our room even though we were quite early before check-in time• Quality - chic, stylish and well-appointed with gorgeous décor and soundproofed windows • Location - peaceful and easy walk from the B&B to the Metro Station, fabulous restaurants, and beautiful L’Eixample neighborhoodOne of the most pleasant among many of hotels and B&Bs we have ever stayed in. We will surely come back here when we are next in the neighborhood.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would highly recommend this B&B for anyone that will be in the area. The location is fantastic, with plenty of shopping and local restaurants and bars steps away. The neighborhood is great and the people are very friendly. The place is very tastifully decorated and inviting. John and Kiku are excellent hosts and can not only tell you the history of the area but can give you guidance on anything you are interested in doing. Breakfast is also a great plus and the staff is sweet. Thank you John and Kiku for such a wonderful experience!!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: When you plan a lifetime holiday and finally make your dream destination, BarcelonaBB makes that reality the dream you had in mind. Old world charm meets modern sophistication without the garish facade. Each room tastefully appointed with all the comforts of home. The building bathed in history, appointed with period detail and architectural splendor. From the huge entry doors, marble entries and the old brass elevator silently whisks residents to their private apartments. Step outside and find yourself in one of the oldest and most picturesque neighbors of Barcelona. Just a few minutes walk to all attractions, including Sagrada Familiar, Tapa Bars and the famous homes built by Antoni Gaudi. We could not have planned a better holiday, and Barcelona BB's Kiku, John, and Nieves have mastered the art of hospitality.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful stay at Barcelona B&B. Jon and Kiku are amazing hosts and Nieves is extraordinary with her attention to detail. The room was spotless and spacious. The communal breakfasts are superb and give you a chance to chat with the other guests and get site seeing tips. The B&B is within walking distance of all the major sites and there are plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. Anything you need is always taken care of. We will only stay at Barcelona B&B on our next trip to Barcelona.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: So glad we found this place. I e mailed before hand as it was my partners 50th birthday while we were there, and asked if they could do something special at breakfast time. Not only did they provide a cake and sing happy birthday on the day, there was a bottle of Cava in the fridge when we arrived! The location was great, and only 2 minute walk to the nearest metro. Kiku was at breakfast every day and very friendly. The lady that serves breakfast was lovely and does the best scrambled eggs ever. The actual accommodation was super clean and very traditionally decorated. every where you looked you noticed different piece of art. I would definitely stay here next time.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Totally in love with Barcelona...the attention that is provided at BarcelonaBB is one like no other. Nieves is the best!! She is one of the sweetest people I’ve ever met. I will always go back and stay. Next time, I may opt for the higher flat.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my third visit to BarcelonaBB and once again completely satisfied.The location is perfect, beautiful area,safe and quiet but at the same time central, near to Paseo de Gracia which is one of the main streets in Barcelona.Our room was great, spacious and comfortable, the B&B is clean and beautiful as I remembered, we enjoyed a good breakfast in the company of our wonderful hosts Kiku and Jon, friendly and helpful as always with great recommendations.Once again I had a lovely time in Barcelona and there is not doubt I will be returning and stay at BarcelonaBB on my next visit to the city.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located just near Sagrada Familia Church (perfect location), the B&B is clean and provides you great hospitality. Owners are very helpful and will guide you throughout your stay.The staffs (specially Telma and Nieves) were very friendly and know the city and places where to go very well. Ask them where to eat and have fun, they will provide you the best information.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We very much enjoyed our stay here. The place is centrally located, nicely appointed and very clean. The key manager was incredibly hospitable and always available. She gave us great tips for local dining. Staying here was a great choice that made our vacation that much more special. We just can't wait to go back.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: FANTASTIC Place.... (Very CLEAN, EXCELLENT location in the middle of everything, very FRIENDLY staff. ). I will use them again when I come back. I will recommend to my friends and family. Thank You. Muchas Gracias
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can’t say enough good things about what a GEM BarcelonaBB is. The staff is helpful, polite and knowledgeable. The breakfast spread is awesome and Nieves will make fresh eggs as you like. The place is very tastefully decorated and clean.The location is awesome. You can walk to La Sagrada Familia and along that strip you can board the tour bus and take in the sights plus shop. There are many nearby restaurants, markets, hair salons and it’s a nice area to just stroll.There is a great little coffee place a cross the street that has great sandwiches and pastries if you are looking for something quick and light.Jon and Kiku are gracious hosts and just great people. I truly feel that the best way to experience Barcelona and it’s culture is by staying in a B & B. choose BarcelonaBB as you will not be disappointed!!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I just visited Barcelona and stay in here BarcelonaBB. We had such a pleasant experience. Centrally located, close to shopping, restaurants and all the tourist attractions. The apartment is beautiful the rooms are super clean and and private. Jon and Kiku are great hosts, they provide delicious family style breakfast every morning and tips about traveling around the city.I would recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in Barcelona! We look forward to staying there again on our next trip back!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couldn't be happier to have stayed here! super clean, had everything I could ever need, well located, kitchen was new, great little balcony to eat breakfast in, absolutely no companies which is rare for me! Irma F.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed at this wonderful BB during our visit to Barcelona from October 10 - 14. The BB is in a great neighborhood and is within walking distance to the Paseo de Gracia, Las Ramblas, La Sagrada Familia. There are plenty of excellent places to eat nearby. We loved the seafood restaurant La Barca del Pescador that is in front of the BB. The freshest seafood great bartenders and is always frequented by "Catalanes". The BB is located in a beautiful building and it elegantly decorated with beautiful pieces and paintings collected by the owners from different parts of the world. Jon Jairo and Kiku are wonderful and will readily answer your questions and suggest great places to eat. The rooms have very comfortable beds and pillow and a Nespresso cofee maker. Nieves prepared the most wonderful breakfast every morning. She is amazing!We were so impressed with this BB that we returned at the end of our trip to stay an additional night before taking our return flight home. DO NOT LOOK FURTHER. You will not regret it.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at BarcelonaBB for 4 nights during our trip to Barcelona. We stayed in the Yellow Room, which is charming and conveniently located in the apartment. Everything was very clean and beautifully decorated. The breakfast was really good too. Our hosts were wonderful and gave us information on places to go where only locals go. The apartment is in a great location within walking distance to Paseo de Gracia and the great Gaudi Buildings as well as restaurants and bars.We really want to go back to Barcelona and when we do, we will definately stay there again. What a gem!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed for three nights in the White room and had an amazing time.Our hosts, Jon and Kiku, were warm and welcoming. They gave us lots of helpful information so that we could make the most of our short stay.We felt right at home and I think it was probably one of the most special places I've ever stayed. The location is fantastic, breakfast was delicious and our room was clean and comfortable. I would highly recommend staying here, you won't regret it. We'll definitely return!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just returned from an 8 night stay at BarcelonaBB…our “home away from home” in Barcelona. We feel so fortunate that we discovered this gem 3 years ago and that we are able to return once or twice a year. It has all the elements that keep us coming back – charming owners/Jon & Kiku, ideal location in the L’Eixample neighborhood with many restaurants, shops, markets, historic sites in walking distance, a variety of rooms & suites at a fair price, beautiful décor with a combination of antiques & modern elements, breakfast each morning at a communal table with a chance to meet and chat with other guests, and truly the loveliest staff/Nieves & Ayesha who make you feel so welcome. And, of course, it’s in beautiful, exciting Barcelona, with such a variety of sites, activities and day trip possibilities. Each visit, we also discover more things to do “off the beaten path.” The amazing City Hall/Casa de la Ciutat in Placa Sant Jaume (open Sunday mornings only.) The Reial Academia Catalana de Belles Arts de Sant Jordi (limited hours Monday – Friday) – a chance to walk in Picasso’s footsteps at his former art school, now a small museum filled with paintings and sculptures by Spanish artists. MUHBA Refugi 307 – a Spanish Civil War bunker in Poble Sec (Sunday morning tours.) And we also spent one leisurely afternoon strolling down the Rambla de Poble Nou – a lovely pedestrianized street in a neighborhood close to Port Olympic. Jon & Kiku…yet another wonderful stay at your very special B&B…Dolc es viure, veure i sentir!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 4 nights. Everything was perfect. Location was great, walking distance to everything . Check in was so easy. Room was nice with everything we needed unlike other reviews it was very quiet. Breakfast was so homey. One of the owners sat with us each morning telling us all about the city and helping us plan the day. I definitely recommend it and will stay here again on our next visit.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 6 days and five nights here at BarcelonaBB and it was truly a home away from home. We booked the wooden room which was quite large with a king size bed. As this was the second part of our trip--it was a welcome change from the tiny beds in London. The owner is very nice and took time to answer any of our questions that we had when we arrived. She didn't stay at the location as she hosts multiple properties but she was an email away. The breakfast in the morning is nice where you can get a continental breakfast with the option of having eggs cooked to order.The location is really amazing for the price that you pay. You are a block away from the metro and approximately 10 minutes from Sagrada Familia. The only minor issue we had was the language barrier at times since not everyone spoke fluent English. This wasn't that big of a deal as we were able to get by. Considering the high prices for hotels especially in August this was truly great value. We would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 2 nights during my first trip to Barcelona. The B&B is located in the lovely Eixample neighbourhood, near some of the main Gaudi-designed buildings and a decent walk to other fun neighbourhoods, with good restaurants a couple of blocks away. Jon and Kiku were warm and friendly, with lots of tips to help us make the most of our short stay in the city. Breakfast is generous, with eggs any style, pastries, cold meats and cheeses, delicious coffee....The "Wooden Room" was impeccably clean and comfortable, and though the bathroom was outside our room, it was for our exclusive use and was spotless. Also very affordable for Barcelona. I'd highly recommend staying here.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this lovely home for 3 nights and we stayed in the Wooden room. The first thing you notice as you walk into the front doors and into the apartment is the heavy decor which personally I love! The home has so much character. Probably good to take note that It isn't a hotel so expect to hear everyone walking around outside your door/next door and using the bathroom. Telma was such a wonderful lady and was so very helpful with suggestions, recommendations and making you feel at home! She had given us the second bathroom for private use so that we didn't have to share which was actually really nice for privacy. Nevis (not sure if I spelt her name right) was the most beautiful lady and she every morning prepared delicious breakfasts , she even packed us a to go breakfast as we had to leave at some stupid hour of the morning to catch the first flight. So lovely!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the wooden room with our own private bathroom outside the room. Such a homely place to stay with lovely, caring and attentive staff and in a fantastic location. Highly reccommend staying here! Everything you need in walking distance and landmarks/tourist attractions also in walking distance. Everything you need is in the room (kettle, coffee machine, small fridge, towels, drawers and wardrobe) and I have no doubt that if you needed anything else the staff would go out of their way to get it for you.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I recently spent 5 nights here for our first long-awaited visit to Barcelona. The first three nights were in the White Room, the last two in the Wooden Room. The White Room was our favorite as it was spacious, including a separate room with a desk, sofa and fridge. The bathroom was also part of the suite. The Wooden Room was attractive, but seemed cramped after the White, and the bathroom was across the hall. As noted in other reviews, the charming, helpful hosts Kiku and Jon were a highlight of our stay as were the women who prepared our delicious breakfasts. You really can't beat the location, we actually walked almost everywhere.We highly recommend this B&B!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: On October 16, 2016 we booked and prepaid for a five night stay starting October 16, 2017. While it is just happenstance that this was exactly one year in advance, it is not unusual for us to book our accommodations well in advance. This was part of a five week trip with a week in Madrid immediately before the stay in Barcelona and a cruise to the U.S. immediately following the stay. Therefore, we did not have flexibility and wanted our accommodations set well in advance. This stay included part of a weekend, the Friday night but not Saturday as we would be boarding the ship on Saturday morning. On May 29, 2017 we received an e-mail from Jon and Kiku announcing that they were getting married around the time of our stay; they needed all of the rooms in the B&B for family and friends and that they were therefore cancelling our reservation and would refund the first night’s payment. I responded, congratulating them on their upcoming nuptials, but reminding them that we had prepaid for the whole stay. They responded acknowledging that we had prepaid for the entire stay and recommending a B&B in the same neighborhood. Barcelona B&B is the sixth highest ranking B&B in Barcelona, and they B&B that they recommended was 28th ranked. They have since refunded our money in full and we have found accommodations at a comparably ranked B&B at an additional cost to us of over $300. Running a B&B is a business. As a customer we feel that we have the right to expect the B&B to honor our reservations, especially prepaid reservations that did not give us the right to back out. While we continue to wish Jon and Kiku a long and happy married life, we think that their wedding arrangements should have respected their business commitments. We do not feel that we have been properly dealt with and our reasonable expectations respected. We have stayed at highly rated B&B’s around the world. We do not stay at Airbnb’s where someone is just renting a room in their apartment. If someone treats their B&B business like a side rental in an apartment then perhaps they should not be in the business.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this boutique bed & breakfast for five nights. It is located in a terrific part of Barcelona, easy access to the metro, walking to good tapas bars and tourist attractions such as Casa Mila. Kiku & John are wonderful hosts, they are very knowledgeable about the city and make great suggestions for places to see and how to get there.The apartments are spotless, with good beds and clean bathrooms. Breakfasts were plentiful, served by very friendly kitchen staff. We were made to feel very at home and part of the family. Each new guest was welcomed individually at breakfast and introduced to others.We did find the rooms a little warm, even with air conditioning. The fan provided was great.Highly recommend this place!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our 4th visit to this charming place, this time in Spring. We are impressed with all the renovations Jon & Kiku have done over the Winter…a bathroom addition, reconfiguring a few main floor rooms so most will have a private bath. But happy to report the things we love most about this place have not changed. Jon & Kiku, ever the engaging and genial hosts. Lovely staff members – Nieves & Ayesha - who ask you each morning – un café? un omelet? Camaraderie shared with other B&B guests at the breakfast table. Beautifully decorated rooms & common areas. And the sense that each guest should feel that this is their home for the next few days while exploring exciting Barcelona. Within walking distance, wonderful restaurants…try The Sopa Boba - it’s nearby and a new one for us, the terrific Concepcio Market only a block away where you can buy every kind of food imaginable, La Vinicola Wine Shop just down the street, Gaudi’s La Sagrada Familia, Casa Mila, Casa Battlo and other Modernista houses only a 10 minute walk, 2 metro stops, the quaint village of Gracia a few steps away, and the AltaFit Gym across the street should you feel the urge to work out…what more could you ask for? Plus a neighborhood gem…the Primavera Café, our “local”, and the place to go for GinTonics that will knock your socks off. Moltes Gracies, Jon & Kiku…we are already dreaming of our next visit!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 3 nights. This place is perfect. Lovely people, spacious rooms and excellent breakfast. It's very clean and well run and a great place to stay being so well located. This place is a gem.Peter Parnes (London)
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our room was essentially our own chic little apartment, fresh and well equipped, with charming artwork that created an upbeat atmosphere. The little porch looks over a lovely Barcelona street from this charming older Barcelona building. The bed was great so we slept well, and there were things to make tea and coffee anytime, which we like.We were welcomed warmly by Jon, who was super helpful with orienting us to both the local neighborhood and Barcelona. He seemed to tune into what we would enjoy, and we loved all his suggestions.We stayed in the White Room, which has an attached bathroom. Breakfast was downstairs. It was a generous array of local specialties as well as familiar breakfast items. So each morning we stepped out well fortified for lots of walking.It is centrally located in the L'Eixample area, so we could walk to many places, like the Gaudi houses, and to really good neighborhood restaurants. It was also easy to get taxis for the short ride to the Gothic and Born areas.If we have the chance to return to Barcelona, this is where we will stay again!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I loved everything about this lovely B&B...the location, the room, the great bathroom, breakfast, the other guests......but especially KIKU!!!!! I would not have loved Barcelona as much had I not stayed there. It was good coming "home" at the end of the day or night
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had a wonderful stay at BarcelonaBB. It was a very comfortable place with great hosts. Jon and Kiku are great hosts and go out of there way to make your stay a wonderful experience. We stayed in the master room which was in the process of being renovated. The bathroom was brand new and the king bed was extremely comfortable. Even though the room had a few little things that needed to be finished there was nothing to inhibit a comfortable stay. I would highly recommend Barcelonabb to anyone visiting Barcelona. We will be back!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I can't echo enough about what has already been said in these reviews. The B&B is extremely clean, convenient location, beautiful building and the hosts are...what can I say attentive, gracious and informative. Kiku and Jon (hope your knee is better) I've really enjoyed staying here, thanks for your hospitality! Will be recommending Barcelona B&B to a friend visiting in April 2017.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The b&b is good if you want to experience something local and stay away from the tourists in gothic quarter. The location is perfect, actually---it's close to the shopping area, some good dining, and Gaudi landmarks. Btw, you should all try the McDonald's on Gracia, as it has macaroons of 85cents each and decent coffees. The chimney room was a little worn down with limited natural light, but okay for our purposes. The breakfast, though, was disappointing given all the good reviews. There's only one kind of bread, fruits that are not very fresh, and a few salamis. They did cook some eggs.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I stayed here for a week and loved everything about it. Kiku and Jon are wonderful hosts. They make you feel at home and do whatever they can to help you have the best visit possible. The B&B is in a beautiful neighborhood located within walking distance of almost everything you would want to see, and there are many good restaurants close by. We had the White room and enjoyed having our own sitting room and balcony. One of our favorite things was meeting the other guests at the breakfast table, sharing information about ourselves or talking about the things to do in Barcelona. It was the perfect place from which to experience this wonderful city.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Barcelona BB is a lovely oasis in this beautiful city. Kiku and Jon are wonderful hosts, happy to help you out! The BB is so cozy and welcoming, the breakfast is great too!! I really loved the communal breakfast gatherings, meeting people from all over the world. Fabulous location, you can walk everywhere !! ❤️
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Start with a great location- neighborhood ambiance, accessible to everything- add a beautiful building and lovely rooms, and top it off with charming hosts, Jon and Kiku, and you have a recipe for a wonderful Barcelona experience. I highly recommend this B and B!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed at the Barcelona B&B for six nights in October 2016. It was a good experience and we recommend that you stay there. Barcelona B&B is conveniently located for touring Barcelona. It is a great property and warmly decorated with art from around the world. Most of all, Kiko and Jon were great hosts. They provided a wealth of information about local restaurants, things to do and places to visit. We stayed in the White Room which was very nice, with a private bathroom and had a small balcony to sit outside. It could easily have accommodated three people. Breakfast, made by Nieves was fantastic. Providing Kiko and Jon with a means of communication and arrival information is important to avoid any problems.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful B & B in the heart of Barcelona! Slightly outside the tourist district, which is a good thing! Jon & Kiku were so much fun and very accommodating to our every need! We stayed in the White Room, and it had a nice sitting area outside of the bedroom which came in handy when my husband wanted to sleep in and I couldn't sleep any longer. I made tea every morning and enjoyed the little balcony. I thought the room might be noisy being right over the street but it wasn't at all! The door to the balcony was great at keeping out the noise! Very clean, good breakfast, couldn't ask for anything else! Probably the best bed I've ever slept in too! I was completely spoiled! Book now and often, I will be back!
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed there for 3 nights. It is charming, nicely decorated and in an amazing location. It is less than 10 min walk to Sagrada Familia and also the high end shopping district. There are many great restaurants and cafes in the area. Both Jon and Kiku were great hosts who were very helpful with restaurant suggestions and things to do. We booked directly with them and were given a 5% discount on our lodging.
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location and fabulous place to stay, our host had breakfast with us and answered any questions we had about getting around. Breakfast had a family feel and was delicious with a variety of food. We stayed in the yellow room which was roomy. We received an email with exact instructions on how to get there. We had just gotten off our cruise and just took a taxi for 17 euro. There were restarunts and grocery store close by
hotelName:
8    BarcelonaBB
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Thank you Jose Maria for such a warm and generous welcome to Coroleu House. Me and my son enjoyed our stay and the terrific value. Nearby transport to city centre, airport and beyond was brilliant .I’m nearly 2 m in height and was a bit worried about bunk bed - it was no problem and I got s good sleep each night. The set up suited us a lot. Gracias George
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This place is good value for the money. You have everything you need and the area is nice and calm. There is a lot of shops and restaurants in the neighborhood. José Maria is eager to help with everything.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The place is very nice as José Maria. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful. It's 20 minutes away from downtown by metro.The house is very clean as the rooms, the bathroom and the sheets. We really appreciated our stay there. Jose Maria is super nice and very helpful. I definitely recommend this place to stay ! ❤️
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I strongly recommend! Well equipped shared kitchen, very clean, beautiful terrace to enjoy meals. In 4-people room we had entrance to a balcony. Good location close to L1 metro route. Will be back again :)
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I and my friend took a family room for six people from Wednesday night till Sunday. The owner is super-friendly and helpful and the location was fine and clean with a fully equipped kitchen and general living room. The house is kids-friendly (had 4 boys) and the free wifi and computer were also handy ...The only thing that I missed was a little waardrobe in the room for the clothes -- but that was compensated by a really nice and clean private bathroom. Good value for money-- I recommend it!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I recommanded Coroleu House to everyone! It is cheap and beautiful. Jose Maria, the owner, is really helpfull and nice! We spend a great time in Barcelona and in this house =) If we will go back to Barcelona (and I hope so), we will come back to this lovely house
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a really great "hostel". Yes it's not really a hostel you will live in a real house in a quiet neighborhood in Barcelona. It's really authentic and Jose is a really great and friendly guy who will come over every day and ask you if you need something. I can only recommend it.But don't get it wrong it's not a party hostel it's very quiet and you should be prepared this neighborhood is some minutes by metro away from party. But if you want some time to relax and explore all those interesting sights in Barcelona this "hostel" is just great.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel in San Andreu part of Barcelona was an unbelievable value for us. Four of us stayed in one room and in the common room for 3 nights for less than one room / night would normally cost. The rooms were in line with expectations of a hostel. The owner was extremely friendly and accommodating, the common rooms were modern and clean and the shared bathrooms clean and efficient. We would gladly stay at Coroleu house again.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Actually it is not a hostel but a house, so you can really feel like home there. The house is very clean, cozy and stylish. If you like cooking, there's a well equipped kitchen at your disposal. The free wi-fi works well. The hotel is located in 20 min by metro from the city centre, but we didn't have any problems with connection even early in the morning. The neighbourhood is very calm and safe (unlike many other places in Barcelona). The owner, Sr. José Maria is very friendly, helpful and responsive. He was doing all possible for our stay to be easy, comfortable and pleasant. All in all, we enjoyed very much our excellent stay there at a very low price. A great deal!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall the accommodation is very affordable, and very clean and modern. It is also fairly convenient to get to many of the sights and city spots!We stayed in their family room with an ensuite -- this made things very convenient! Would recommend getting an ensuite for more privacy, as one of the common showers is just a cubicle.It was also very good that a kitchen was provided, along with a refrigerator.Jose Maria and his mother made us feel very, very welcomed in Barcelona. They have even set out maps with recommended eateries and tourist spots. He also gives good tourist-tips (which travel cards to buy, when to watch out for your stuff, etc.), which was very kind of him!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel is actually a house, and thanks to its owners, feels like a home. José Maria and Guadalupe makes us feel as if we belong there. The facilities are very clean and confortable. I recommend it, if you are planning on visiting Barcelona by day. I say that because the metro closes at midnight and the hostel is a little bit far from the city itself. Anyhow, the cost and what is given is worth it.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Do yourself a favor and stay here! It's like staying at a pristine guesthouse downtown barcelona. Not far, probably about a 5-10 walk to the subway which is only 1£ each way. The owners are around and happy to answer a tourist's question and do a good job of pretending they haven't heard it 100 times before. Security was top notch
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The owner is very hospitable and always ready to answer your questions or give advice about the city. The house is clean, located in a enjoyable neighborhood with access to the city center in about 20-30 minutes by metro. Good quality/price.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Really nice and helpful owners, quiet neighbourhood, perfect for a rest from packed centre. Close to the metro with all the shops you need and small restaurants and bars with great prices and pleasant people. Hostel is really nice, with big kitchen (with all maps and roads you need), living room and terrace.We couldn't expect more for that price and when we will visit Barcelona again, we know where to stay :)Hola Jose :)
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was looking for something a bit more quiet than the big city hostel, and at Coroleu House I found that and more. If you are not looking for a party hostel but a place less crowded, this is the place for you. Don't worry about the distance to the city centre, if you are going somewhere in Barcelona, you need to take the Metro anyway. The house is located in the quiet and friendly San Andrea area, and only a 10 min walk from a direct Metro to the city centre, and the direct railway line to the Airport terminal 2. There is also a marked close by, that's open till 24. There is also restaurants and small shops close by. The hostel is clean and the host very friendly and helpful. It is his passion to be a good host, and it shows. This place is highly recommended, and I will probably stay there myself again for my next trip to Barcelona.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Our stay at Coroleu House was absolutely perfect. I honestly can not praise this hostel enough. We were greeted by Jose Maria's wonderful mother who was exceptionally helpful in so many ways- directions, recommending places to go and making us feel settled in our accommodation.The accommodation itself was cosy and homely. Placed in Sant Andreu, it was a friendly and on the first day, being pasty white in the scorching Barcelona sun, a concerned resident in the streets stopped us to make sure I was wearing high suncream. This summed up the community and it felt, to us, as though we were part of it.I would strongly recommend staying at Coroleu House if you're looking for a hostel with a personal touch! So much love for this wonderful little home from home.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is super suitable for friends to stay. There is a big living room downstairs. The room is clean and the location is good. There are restaurants around and is only 5 min walk to the nearest metro station. People in Barcelona are very nice and willing to help around.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: If you want to stay at a chilled familiar house instead of a crowded&noisy hostel, definately this is your place! absolutely clean and well equipped, may more than a hotel. Last but not least Jose Maria is the best host, his tips made much easier to discover BCN. Highly recomennded!The best place where I ever stayed so far ))
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Coroleu house BCN is one of the best places for young people to stay in Barcelona. The owner is incredibly nice, the house is awesome. Despite its distance from the center, it is and will be a very good choice, we appreciated every moment of this!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed at the Coroleu House for four nights recently with my boyfriend. On a budget, he and I had agreed to stick to hostels mainly. However, as a light sleeper & a person who hates party hostels (as most are), I was hesitant. However, this hostel is located in a real house in a neighborhood where there are no tourists (yet a few minutes walk from the metro)! I feel like less than ten guests were there, and it was never loud or obnoxious. Jose Maria, the owner, is super sweet and attentive to your needs. He explained everything we needed to know. I also ended up getting sick while I was there and he wrote my boyfriend a note in Catalan to give to the pharmacist (who subsequently got me medicine). There was a big kitchen filled with everything you could need, and I used it to make dinner once. I read a review on here saying "I wish they had more than 2 bathrooms". They do- there are 2 showers and 3 toilets. The only complaint if anything I would have is that the upstairs rooms are extremely hot, around 75 degrees I would say, and my roommates and I did not even use a sheet. The air conditioning did not work up there. A simple fan would fix this issue. Everything else- perfect! Would definitely come back!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great less busy neighbour hood. The house is nice and always very clean and secure. It has several bathrooms and lockers for everyone. Jose was also a friendly and warm person. He also has a lot of information on Barcelona and the local area
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this hostel is most clean and free. it has also locker and good security.and balcony is also good. we ate dinner in the place. very nice atmosphere. Jose maria who is host is very kind and polite. we stayed just two night because reservation is full. you have to make a reservation now. obviously you will be not regret
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The house of Jose Maris is beautiful, it is a real house that is very clean, you have a big kitchen where you have everything you need, you also have the large living room. You also have a lot of shop around and a big shopping center "The maquinista" Neighborhood is quiet, it is 50 min by foot from the city center and from the beach but it is really better than in the city center. Believe me, I have been in Barcelona hostels that are in the city center, they are almost all awful... If I am back in Barcelona, I will always stay in the Jose Maria house. The only one little thing is that it is not possible to pay by the credit card but it is ok.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Barcelona is amazing! It's a beautiful city but things can get ruined quite easily if you stay in a bad accomodation. This is house was awesome! It's very clean and cozy and you instantly feel at home! The rooms are spacious and comfortable with good wifi connection. The staff (Jose Maria) is super friendly and helpful and extremely reliable! The location is slightly out of the crowded city centre but very close to train and metro stations! I would absolutely recommend this guest house to anyone because you get really good value for your money!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was with my BFF and we spent a spectacular, fantastic stay in this house! It was so comfortable, cozy, nice, pleasant... beautiful, spacious well decorated (for christmas) and very clean! And the best for last: Jose Maria! My sweet, adorable, lovely, friendly, delightful host; he is the best host ever! Obviously, I recommend his house to all of you. Indeed it's the perfect compromise for a good price and a very good level of comfort! We will definetely choose it again next time!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The location was very good, the staff was friendly and facilities were excellent. Very close to the main station and mostly everything else.We had a fantastic time there and we'll be back for shoure.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel has it all guys. First and foremost, its spacious and clean. Let me break it down for you: I was traveling in a group of 6 girls. We booked the private 6 person room and even with that many girls we felt that we had plenty of space. I might even argue that it was luxurious for a hostel in Europe.In addition, the hostel in a beautiful area that gives you the feeling of living in Barcelona while still keeping it convenient to all the touristy sights. There aren't tourists everywhere and the restaurants in the area are super chill and authentic. Real talk: it maybe took us between 5 and 10 minutes to get around and even when it was crowded in the metro, trains came every 3 minutes or so. The Barcelona metro system is inexpensive, safe, clean, and easy to figure out. By the time we left Barcelona (4 days), we were pro's at getting to and around the city center. Lastly, the hostel was clean, spacious, and had everything that you need if you want to do things like make breakfast or dinner while you're there. Really there is no where else that I would stay! I can guarantee that you will be more than happy with this choice!Now a final, final word on our gracious host. Everything that all the other reviews have said are true. Jose is warm, kind, and full of recommendations! Immediately when you get there Jose give you an in-depth break down of the sights and neighborhoods. More than that though, he tell you his favorite places to eat and the best ways to spend your days in Barcelona. Every one of his recommendations that we tried turned out to be amazing! Trust me, you should stay here because when you stay at Coroleu house you don't feel like you're at a hostel. You feel like you're visiting one of your friends who happens to have a huge house in the middle of Barcelona. Lucky you!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for 4 nights and everything was amazing. The host Jose is a really lovely host whose top priority is to make you enjoy your stay in Barcelona. He knows the city very well and gives you tips on what to do, when and where.The house is very clean, modern kitchen, comfortable living area and a beautiful patio. It was exactly like in the pictures shown. The area where the hostel is, Sant Andreu, is a beautiful part of Barcelona, very quiet and charming. Barcelona can be quite hectic during the day if you go to all the tourist places, so it's really nice when you return to your hostel after a long day and can just enjoy yourself and feel like home. It really feels like a home, and the host Jose made sure of that.5 stars can recommend!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is one of the best places I've ever stayed. Located in a quiet suburb about 15 minutes on the train or underground from all the tourist sites in Barcelona, it was near enough to be convenient, but peaceful after a long day in the sunshine. The train line also runs directly to the main airport making it really convenient. There were a number of small supermarkets and bakeries within easy walking distance, and also a few nice restaurants and tapas places nearby.The owner is the perfect host; nothing was too much trouble, and he has lots of handy tips to help you make the most of the city. He forwarded some ideas of places to go via what's app, which meant I could access maps for them when I was out and about. The place was spotlessly clean, with comfortable beds, and a well equipped kitchen and lounge area. Security was good, with individual lockers in the dorm room, and code access to the front door which was changed daily. The bathrooms were modern and clean, and there was always hot water available from the powerful showers. There was a nice enclosed terrace area with seating out the back, and wi-fi throughout the building. Towels and sheets were also provided, along with use of a hairdryer and iron, which are nice extras when you've been away from home for a while. The price of the dorm beds here is an absolute bargain, I'd recommend Coroleu House to anyone travelling on a budget. In fact, even if I was richer, I would still stay here!Thank you Jose Maria for your hospitality, I will stay here again next time I am in Barcelona.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Couldn't have asked for a better host. Everything was clean and 24-hour service. It's not right downtown but definitely still in the city. Close to two subway lines and the accessible by the N3 or N9 night buses. Top notch
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Six of us stayed here while in Barcelona for four days, and it was a delight. It was kept clean throughout our stay, and the amenities (free wifi, coffee, kitchen access, common areas) helped our group be able to relax after long days/nights of walking. The owner was very friendly, and was willing to give us tips on things to do during the week of La Merce. If (or when) I return, I would use this hostel again.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel isn't located in a typical tourist area, but with the metro you get in the city super fast and experience the local ways of living. The owner and operator of the hostel is very courteous and provides excellent introductions to the city and property - so you don't have to buy a tourist guide. Also, the price was very reasonable and we had not expected a hostel with this equipment (large kitchen, towels, free coffee, outdoor area, nice living room and so on). The only thing we would criticize is that although there are two showers, one of them isn't lockable and located directly in the hallway - despite we never had to wait long time for showering. All in all we would definitely recommend the hostel!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at Coroleu House whilst in Barcelona for 5 nights. The hospitality that Jose showed us and to each and everyone of his guests is second to none! Nothing is too much trouble for Jose and he goes out of his way to ensure you have the very best time possible during your visit to his beautiful city. The house was extremely clean and comfortable. Supermarkert, good restaurants, and the metro are all a short 5-10 min walk away. Approximately 20 min ride on the metro to Las Ramblas, the main centre of Bareclona. We would definately return.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been staying at the Coroleu House for three nights in September 2014. I have enjoyed this little cozy house made hostel very much for its tidyness, cleanliness, and home like feeling. It is a bit outside of Barcelona city centre, but this is as much an upside as a downside. However, the metro station and public transportation is really just 5 minutes away. Moreover, Jose', the hostel owner, is incredibly friendly and helpful. He will help you wrap your head around Barcelona and advise on where to eat and what you see.Next time, I will definitely come back. It is not for people looking to exclusively party.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is the best hostel we've ever been to! It is clean and tidy, very well equipped with new stuff. The host - Jose Maria is a very hospitable guy - he wants you to feel at home and enjoy Barcelona. Don't be scared about the distance from the centre - it's about 10 to 15 minutes away from all of major sites, and in Barcelona you will have to use metro anyway. Thank you!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have been in this hostel twice. Both times staff has been extra friendly and flexible with check-in and check-out times. Everything works well and there you can have relaxed cozy feeling. Not for party people! Communication with staff works perfectly and they make their best to help you with all questions.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: After travelling Europe for 2 months, we decided to relax in Barcelona for 10 days. We chose this hostel based on affordability as well as the excellent reviews and pictures! When we first arrived, we were greeted by the kindest individual - Jose. He goes above and beyond for customer service, treats you like you are entering his house, gives you AMAZING local tips and cheap eats. You feel like you are staying in a very nice house instead of a hostel. He even provides his own food for the kitchen (which is incredibly clean and big!). The rooms are very clean! The cleanest we've seen. Very close to a metro station and the best tapas place we have ever had! After staying in 13 hostels this summer - this one was easily the best! I can honestly say my experience in Barcelona wouldn't have been so great if I didn't choose this hostel. Thank you Jose!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I chose this hostel based on pictures and good reviews I saw here in Tripadvisor. I can say the place is really nice and comfortable, and people we met there is very nice. BUT if I had to visit Barcelona that wouldn’t be my first option since it takes ages to move from the hostel to the downtown and other places of interest.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was the best Hostel we have ever been! if you plan to come to Barcelona, it's for sure the best Place to be! It is very clean and tidy and there is a very nice common area, kitchen and clean bathrooms. You feel very welcome and like home and you get a lot of useful information about Barcelona!It's really worth to visit! :-)
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great place: the owner, José Maria is a fantastic host and he helped us for everything (landmarks, beaches, restaurants, bars..). The house is wonderful and very clean, in a lovely and very quiet neighborhood. It's not so closed to the city center but the metro is 5 minutes far (anyway barcelona is served by buses, taxies and subway). If you want to go to Barcelona, choose this hostel.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Coroleuhouse was like a home away from home in Barcelona. We had originally planned to stay in Barcelona for two days but loved it so much we stayed for another three. The house was very clean and José and his family were extremely friendly would highly recommend staying here!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Coroleu House is fantastic!! You can think it's a little far, but even the neighborhood is incredible and charming! It's host, Jose Maria is so helpfull... he's really a great guy, ok? Being ther is like home, but in Barcelona.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Amazing hostel, very clean, well looked after, new and feels fresh. José Maria is super helpful and friendly and will go out of his way to make your time in Barcelona just the way you want it and the hostel itself is a great place to meet other friendly travellers too.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I would recommend Coroleu House to every person staying in Barcelona. One of thethings that makes the place special is it´s host Jose María which is such a lovely guy, he will help you in everything you need for your confort and with tips around all the city. The house facilities are very clean, new and with a juvenile feeling. I would definetly come back!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is one of the best hostels I ever stayed. Thanks to the hostel owner Jose Maria - he is very friendly and helpful person, he made everyone smile all the time :)The hostel itself is very nice :) It has everything you need during your stay shop just around the corner, a couple of nice bars, kitchen. And security is very strong.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Jose Maria and his mother are really friendly and always ready to help. The neighbourhood is quiet and safe to walk. Within a short metro ride you are in the central city. The rooms are really good, there is lockers and the bathrooms are superclean. I had a great time definetly. Loved Barcelona! Recommended hostel!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I will recommand Coroleu House to every person that wants to spend some days in Barcelona, with amigos, in couple or even alone ! The house is clean, and full of good energies, you will definitively feel at ease, like at home. With the metro you go directly to Plaça Catalunya in 10/15 minutes. The owmer, José Maria, is so sympatic, et very very welcoming. The price are low, this place is fabulousThere's only one problem: when you come at Coroleu House, you never want to go back home! Enjoy your stay.  Maureen
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I loved my visit! Jose Maria is a wonderful guy who runs a small hostel made to feel like you are living in a house in Barcelona. He is very helpful with lots of maps and information for people visiting briefly or for a more extended stay. The hostel itself is in a quiet neighborhood and a short metro ride to the city center. It's a great place to go back rest after a busy day and night in town!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: José María is a bit extravagant, but always friendly and worried about his clients. The hostel is one of the cleanest I've ever been. Is close of the metro but far away from the noise of the center of Barcelona. Also the price was quite convenient.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Away from mad and tacky La Ramblas, Coroleu House is where the locals live. 10 mins by train into city, its really convenient. Jose Maria will share all his tips of local restaurants,one of it which served delicious 2 course set lunch for 7euro! His hospitality is gracious, filled with nothing but warmth and sincerity . The beds are comfortable, and the house is spotless. We are thinking of going back again this Fall. Stay here, you wont regret!
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Possibly the best hostel to stay at Barcelona. Beautiful building, extra-nice owners and everything perfect! It's the only place I know I didn't find any single drawback. It is not located in the downtown but you get by metro or train (rodalies) in around twenty minutes.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: On a two and a half week trip with friends - all of us fresh out of high school - this was by far the best hostel we stayed at. If you're looking for a hostel that feels like home, there's no other way to go. The atmosphere at Coroleu House is, as the title suggests, incomparable. From the cleanliness of the hostel to the amazingly hospitable owner, Jose Maria, no other place we stayed felt as nice. We would go on to rent out an apartment for ourselves in Paris, and I can still say with absolute confidence, that Coroleu House felt more like home. Everything is within reach of the metro which is a mere 3 minutes away. It's situated in a beautiful, quiet neighborhood, which was a relief in contrast to the city center which was always alive. And I can't possibly say enough about Jose Maria. From the moment we stepped into Coroleu House, he was ready to help us with our trip. From sightseeing recommendations to dinner reservations, he was never too busy to lend us a hand. We owe much of our beautiful stay in Barcelona to Jose Maria. For your money, nothing else compares.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not even a question. If you're looking for a hostel, there's nowhere else to consider.1. The place is the cleanest hostel we stayed in all trip, we had the 6 bed private room and it was incredibly tidy, as was the kitchen and living room.2. The location, while a little removed from the city, is only 10 minutes away via metro, which is very easy to use, and is a gorgeous neighborhood with shops galore during the day, and silent as a mouse at night. Provides a wonderful contrast coming home from the clubs when you get off the bus and the neighborhood is asleep. Also everything is cheaper in this neighborhood3. Most importantly, however, is the owner. Hospitality is something to be expected at a hotel, but Jose Maria (the owner) treats you like family. You want to eat paella? He makes a reservation for you. You need a tip on a place to get clothes? Send a text/whatsapp/whatever else you may have and he'll reply with a recommendation almost immediately. We have him to thank for recommending our best food and best sites. Jose Maria is the man.In conclusion, there is no reason not to stay here. Even with all of those benefits, the price was still remarkably low. Staying here was the best decision we made all trip.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel is fantastic. It worth the money and even if it's not in the city center you can get there in less 10min by metro, and from airport has direct conection by train. Good option who wants to get some rest after a day full of walking without noise and stress! Even if you want to go out for ramblas, its close, is an excelent choice due the quality of facilities and the final price per day!The facilities are really good, always clean. The neighbourhood of Sant Andreu is really quite, welcoming and has good tapas aswell, but cheaper ! Everything was perfect, i was really impressed with the owner Jose Maria, he provides a lot of information and advices according with your days in the city, always online by whatsapp for any requests. Overall, it was perfect. I've never stayed on a hostel like this one. Quality-price outstanding, closer to the town, hosts really helpful and welcoming. I strongly recommend!I'll stay there for sure if i'll go to Barcelona again.
hotelName:
9    Coroleu House Barcelona
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had booked a trip for a few nights to Barcelona for my boyfriends birthday and as we were on a budget we decided to stay here. Knowing it is a hostel made me apprehensive, however as soon as we arrived all worries we might have had were quickly erased. The staff are all wonderful, kind and funny giving us all the information we could need and more. We had booked a shared bathroom but were upgraded to a private. The room was tidy and clean and had everything we could need. The location was perfectly central with so many amazing things right on our doorstep. I would highly recommend this as accommodation while staying in Barcelona and we will be sure to be back.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I made a reservation with Guesthouse Gotic last week through Agoda, which is the same platform as Booking dot com. According to the booking a EUR payment was to be collected by the property as a non-refundable pre-payment. I paid online by credit card.During the night after I made my booking my credit card was charged in GBP for a different amount than the contractually agreed EUR amount. The property only has a minimalist webpage with only a phone number and no email address to contact. I tried to contact them via Agoda customer service, which is a hellish experience and called them to have the charge reversed, or a written confirmation that this is only supposed to be a pre-authorization, which will be reversed once I pay in EUR at the property.Via phone they lied to me and claimed that they had not charged my credit card, which was a blatant lie since I had my credit card statement in front of me.Via Agoda support they eventually acknowledged that they indeed charged my card with a fraudulent amount but both Agoda and the property exhibited an utter incompetence in getting the issue resolved.After several days back and forth via Agoda automated support system and several phone calls to the property, my booking was eventually cancelled without my consent and the fraudulent amount PARTIALLY refunded by the property. I made a loss since they probably refunded the fraudulent GBP amount and not the actual EUR amount.This cost me a substantial amount of time and nerves and is due to corrupt business practices and utter incompetence, STAY AWAY!
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Now this is a hostel I am willing to stay at again! A friend and I stayed in a private room for 3 nights... good price for the location. Spacious room, feels very clean. Bathroom down the hall, and not too many people to a bathroom, as I never saw another person! I haven’t stayed in many hostels and had one bad experience, but Barcelona Gotic opened my mind. Very modern decor.Location and the hostel itself feel very safe. 2-3 blocks from La Rambla and metro stops.Everything was very hotel-Like, which is pretty much the only way I’ll go.Front desk allowed us free locker space when we first arrived while we went out on the town waiting for our room to open up.Would definitely recommend for lodging in the Gotic Quarter, and Barcelona in general. Happy I stayed here.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Right in the middle of the Gotic Quarter.The lodgings where fantastic.Friendly staff and very clean.Everything inside looked brand new.On top of it the price was very good.The place had free wifi and 24/7 a person in the reception, we didnt try the breakfast.I would recomend!!!
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in a private room with ensuite for three nights for our long weekend. It was very basic but perfect for just sleeping as we were out from 10:00 - 23:00 each day. The staff are friendly and the location is fab! Wasn't too loud considering it's on a busy street. The shower was nice (good pressure and hot!) Room got cleaned and fresh towels every day. Hair dryer was very weak. Matress pretty firm. Free wifi. DIdn't have the breakfast but it's only 3 euros.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I came for a short break in Barcelona at the end of July and were delighted with the Guesthouse. The room was comfortable, they moved us to a superior room (with private bathroom) for no extra charge and had good sized lockers for us to store our case in (as we arrived in the city early morning before we could check in). The service was excellent.The location is ideal. From the guesthouse the walking time to places such as La Rambla, Barceloneta, La Catedral and Ciutadella is very easy (anything from 5 minutes to 15 minutes). There are some wonderful bars and restaurants within a stones throw of the guesthouse (Bar Celta Pulperia and Colom Restaurant were two of our favourites - both less than 5 minutes walk from the guesthouse).The only slight difficulty we had was controlling the temperature in our room (we were in Barcelona during a reasonably hot weekend). There was a large fan provided, but the fan wasn't very effective. Nonetheless, the shower water temperature could be turned down cold if desired and the large balcony-style doors both proved helpful in mitigating this. No hesitation in recommending this place to all visitors in central Barcelona who want comfort but without paying inordinate amounts of money to central hotels.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We booked a room of three people for a single night stay on our way through Barcelona, and for the price, we were very pleasantly surprised. The location is fantastic, less than five minutes from the bars and restaurants of La Rambla and in the middle of the lovely Gothic Quarter.The staff were great and welcomed us, and although we had paid for a shared bathroom they upgraded us to a private room with bathroom which was fantastic. The room had a ceiling and wall fan, so although a little noisy, it was a good night's stay in an air conditioned room (after a week in 35 degree heat!) Great little find and would definitely stay here again.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Guesthouse is centrally located and has all necessary facilities, they clean up the rooms every day, the security seems to be good since the reception is occupied 24/7 and you can enter the hostel only of they know you/let you in.We liked our stay at the Guesthouse except for the staff, they were unfriendly and e.g. arguing about payment right on arrival with no credit card acceptance (only cash). Who carries around so much money in cash? Also, when I tried giving them a review, I noticed that thay cancelled my reservation on the booking webpage, although we stayed at the Guesthouse during all the days of the reservation.All in all, good value for the money but it could be perfect, if the staff were nice! In an international city like Barcelona smiling and being helpful is a must.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Very good location, in center of the old city, near the Rambla and in walking distance to the seaside.. The guesthouse is situated in an old traditional building with tre characteristic atrium in the midlde. The staff is frienly and wellcomming. The breakfast is good for the price.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Did everything it needed to for the price. Good location, friendly helpful staff. I stayed in a single room which had a little balcony. Only downside is the walls are thin so I could hear the neighbouring rooms' tv.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Basic accommodations in the gothic quarter off La Ramble. The staff is very helpful and professional. The room was small but clean. Was very satisfied with our 5 day stay. The surrounding neighborhood is active late at night and can be noisy if the windows are left open. Great value.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: What a nice place to stay and was exactly what we needed. Travelling with teenagers and close to the beach, La Rambla, Picasso Museum, ambiance. Great welcome and assistance of the lady in charge. Gave us a larger rom as we were with kids and much appreciated as have own bathroom. Thank you. So we easy to be around. Room was big and good housekeeping service. Perfect for us. Will back.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was very average, small for two people and had no air conditioning, only fans which were very noisy at night. It is in an an excellent location near to Gaudi exhibition centre, restaurantsand la rambla- however as newbies to Barcelona we didn't realise this until our last day and when we asked the receptionist for some advice on our first evening about which museums we should see or what restaurants she didn't tell us any of this information about its excellent location within 5 mins of everything!!! frustrating, also the coffee machines were broken and the pole that held our curtain broke and when reported no one came to fix it. I won't be rushing back here. It is clean and great location that is it!
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hi, Me and my husband stayed at Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic for 3 nights and really enjoyed it. It has very friendly staff and a perfect location where you are close to most things. The rooms are pretty basic but they are clean and there is everything you need. So we would definitely come back and stay there.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a comfortable guesthouse, in a superb location: on a narrow mediaeval street, right in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of the Ciutat Vella (Old Town). My room was clean and well-equipped, with a window that opened out onto a quiet residential street. There's also a 24-hour reception. The breakfast buffet is insanely good value at just 3 euros: you really could eat enough to last you all day if you wanted! My only complaint is that the staff members are a bit variable: I had a very sullen check-in experience.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here for 3 nights with 2 friends in the three person bedroom with en suite bathroom. I'd never stayed in a hostel before so was fairly apprehensive prior to arrival. Our room was spacious, clean and we were provided with fresh towels every day. Staff were friendly and helpful. Strong Wifi connection in the room. The hostel is located in a great area, just a few minutes walk to La Ramblas and easy to get to tourist sites. Only downsides were that the safe was not working (and we had to give our key to reception every time we left) and the room got a bit cold during the night, other than that I can't fault it for the price!
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Comfortable accommodation, well connected and in a good location. Dear staff. We have been offered an accommodation with en-suite for the price of one with shared bathroom. Good breakfast for the price of 3 € per person
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hostel is in the gothic area which is a central area and is bordered by cuitat vella with is the main centre of Barcelona. It's a short walk from famous sights like Las Ramblas. If you're getting a private single room you have to share a bathroom but it's all very clean and decent. Walls are a bit thin so sleep can be interrupted. Would definitely recommend for the solo traveller especially!
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Incredibly friendly staff, very clean, very artsy, perfect location. More of a hotel than hostel. Rooms cleaned every day and fresh towels given. Incredible value for money. Got upgraded to private en suite free of charge despite booking shared bathroom. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to all- young people and families alike
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We couldn't be more positive about our three day stay at Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic. Jordi and all the staff were extremely helpful with all of our questions including directions, and any other information we sought. The shared bathroom was spacious and clean, our room was clean and perfect.Their location in the Gotic district made for easy walking to nearby attractions, metro, etc.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the location of the guesthouse is ideal if you want to be centrally based - its a 5 minute walk to las Ramblas, 10 minutes to the beach and from the metro stations nearby you can get to all the major attractions. The room we were given was better than we expected - the room was cleaned daily and fresh towels provided when used. although you could hear people in the street outside in the evening (if the balcony doors were open..) it was not excessive and quiet by the time we went to sleep. the staff were very friendly and helpful when needed. we didn't have breakfast at the guesthouse so cannot comment on that. the restaurants and bars nearby were excellent and there were lots of shops and markets within strolling distance. we would definately stay again, in fact we were already considering coming back with our children very soon. For the price, location and value I can't see how any other hostel or hotel could come close.
hotelName:
10    Guesthouse Barcelona Gotic
