review_body: We stood in this hotel for 5 days. The standard family room was facing city and beach with good view. The space is less compared to the hotels in other places. Cleanliness is excellent. All bathroom accessories provided. Bathroom slippers were not provided. Break fast was good or average with not much each day. They store luggages. Staff are courteous and speak English. Taxis available always outside.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 7 friends had 3 different bookings for 5 rooms. #1: 30 minutes before arrival at the hotel my friend got a sms from the hotel that her room was cancelled. She called and were told they had cancelled the room because her creditcard had expired. She asked if they could hold a room for 15 minutes, as we would soon arrive at the hotel. But no….. When we got to the hotel 10 minutes later, my friends finally managed to get a room at the same price as the original booking. #2: I booked and prepaid for 2 rooms, checked in and went to my room. The second room was given my other friends. #3: When I got to my room, the reception called and said there was a mistake, I had to bring my luggage and come down again. The hotel staff said we had cancelled the 2 rooms of the third booking, but that was not the case. My friend only cancelled 1 room, she had printed the booking confirmation and even called to hotel earlier to confirm. But no… They said we only had 2 rooms and we suddenly got two different rooms with extra beds. We asked if we could book one more and pay for it now, but no. "no other rooms available". After I checked the internet, and different booking sites had available rooms! But at higher price. They claimed this happened because a change of the name of the guest in one of the rooms in my #2 reservation! So that was why two rooms of the #3 reservation was cancelled...?!? I dont understand.2 completly different reservations, made by different persons, and still they mix them.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The Worst Novotel, that I have ever stayed !!I’m a frequent traveler in Accor hotels. With a Platinium card ... The bathroom was dirty ! The bath was destroyed ... the curtains broken ... the floor so old ! At the reception they told me... it was an EXCECUTIVE rooom ! L O L.I asked for the late check out, the cleaning lady came in my room without knocking 3 times ... 12h10 - 12h30 - 12h50 ! I couldn’t call the reception, the phone was broken !! AWFULL HOTEL ...Look the pictures !
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: To me perfect location, nice upgrade, Fitness and Hamam out of order. Room exzellent, breakfast good choice, nobody at front desk at 0500 for departure, very close to Glories shopping center and Metro station
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife doesn’t I stayed in an 8th floor corner suite. The hotel was excellent. The bed was incredibly comfortable and the linens crisp and outstanding. Our room included breakfast which was more than you really need. The hotel is a five minute walk from the metro. The metro is easy to use and you’re a on a direct line to Catalan Square. I think it was a 15 minute walk to Sagrada Familia, in fact you can see it from the rooftop patio. Friendly staff. A taxi stand just across the street. A beautiful mall across the street with some excellent and reasonably priced restaurants. A great choice.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel has a very nice location near to Barcelona's enterprise center. It’s comfortable and somehow classy. The pool on the top floor has an amazing view; the staff from the bar on the top floor is super.However, we felt that the staff at the reception was not very competent. We had many issues to get a simple invoice from our stay. It took 6 hours and 2 return visits to the hotel to have them issue a simple invoice with the correct data. If you are in a hurry to catch a plane or if you have to go to work, they simply don’t care.For business, maybe we will continue to use this hotel due to it’s price and location. For leisure, there are other similar hotels with better location, cheaper offer and maybe more efficient staff.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for five days in an executive room. The hotel is brilliantly located (less than 10 minutes from Glories - the nearest Metro station and only 25 minutes walk from La Sagrada Familia). There are a selection of restaurants and shops close to the hotel and a great shopping centre across the road. We were on the 17th floor and the view from our room with city view was well worth it. The rooms were clean and well equipped and similar standard to other Novotels we have stayed in. The breakfast was very impressive and there was great choice. This hotel was a brilliant base for our first time in Barcelona! Quick tip, if you want to make use of a hop on bus, make sure you book the red bus which stops right outside not the bus turistic which you will have to catch in town.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: - rooms enaugh spacious- shower clean and nice- mattress comfortable BUT - long waiting for check-in & check-out- 3 types of strange noises in the room, not from fridge, so from where?- no ventilation in toilet - the same type of foods for brakefast for 3 days, no diversity always long waiting for check-in, check-out-
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It is our first time visiting Barcelona.been always wanting to see the Anton Gsudi's Sagada familia and his other fastastic architeture buildings. We were definitely not disappointed. We stayed the Novotel BCN city hotel. It is walking distsace to the SF and other sight seeing spots . The hotel is next door to the Iconic Glores Agbar towel. Novotel is of usual high stsrdard services . It has good comfy beds very good receptionists staffs services and a top floor roof roof top pool and bar with good view to the sea and city . We enjoyef staying there
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very nice and clean, rooms are quiet. Restaurant on the premise is nice, very good breakfast. We also had dinner one night, which was very good. Music in the lobby. Hotel is in the perfect location, shopping mall across the street with a lot of restaurants. Close to the metro and buses.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here with my wife and 2 children for 5 nights. First start off with the positives. The check in process was simple, staff were warm and friendly, breakfast when taken was really nice. The room was nice although perhaps a bit bigger for a family but we coped and wasn’t a problem as it’s just a place to sleep and rest. Staff were good at giving advice and booked us hop on and hop off tickets. Negatives would be the elevators. With so many people at the hotel I would expect more than 3 lifts which was frustrating during busy periods. The most frustrating part was when the key cards to take you to your floor decided to stop working so you would be going back and forth. One time I spent a good 15 minutes between lifts and then had enough and walked to the 17th floor. Other frustrating bit was the one day we had sunshine my kids wanted to use the pool but couldn’t as no lifeguard about. He was there when it was raining so didn’t make sense. I would use Novotel again but certainly can be improved. Loved the view from our room
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Just spent 5 nights in the Novotel.Excellant stay. Small swimming pool and roof top bar. Excellant views of Barcelona. Great location for all the sights .Easy access to the Metro/trams/buses/taxis and cycle hire. Great shopping centre 1 minute away. Would highly recommend.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Many thanks to the friendly staff, either at the reception during check in or check out, or in the restaurants & bars.The room was perfect, clean & spacious.Shame we couldn't use the rooftop pool this time, due to the weather.Once again thanks to all the hotel employees.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent location. Nearby metro stops. Nearby Barcelena City Tour stop. Terrific breakfast buffet. Goodly number of polyglot staff. Courteous, friendly, helpful, efficient staff. Glories Shopping Center across the street from hotel restaurant. Ave. Diagonal area in front of hotel restaurant also served by tram and bus.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Typical Novotel, but with better bathroom than usual. There is a rooftop pool, but not available until summer.Breakfast is ok, nothing special.A small shopping mall is located right next to the hotel.Glories metro station is the nearest one.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at the Novotel Barcelona City for 3 nights for family city break with 2 small children. Hotel location was great, just a short walk from the metro with easy links to the centre. Sagrada Familia was walkable as was the beach. One of the hop on hop off bus services stopped just outside and there was a shopping mall with restaurants just over the road too. Staff at the hotel were all extremely welcoming and helpful. Breakfast was extensive, delicious and with something for everyone. Roof top bar and pool looked great although we couldn't use the pool because we were there out of season. Rooms were fine. Enough room for 4, although we spent very little time in the rooms. Finally little touches such as a constant supply of drinking water, and marshmallows in reception were really welcome too and enjoyed by our kids and their parents! Would recommend this hotel and gladly return
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Novotel is always a safe choice when you are picking hotels. They are clean, comfortable and usually have a very nice breakfast. This one is no exception. Staff was business like. This hotel is right next door to a mall with options of good restaurants to chose from. Rooftop pool and bar don a awesome view especially at night. Camp Nou and Train Station is a little drive and it is quite a bit away from the airport (40 euros). Most of the Barcelona attractions are not too far via taxi. We walked over to Sagrada in 15 minutes. There are so many pluses for this hotel. The only thing I would complain about the room size. This Novotel has the smallest size rooms compared to other Novotels I stayed in.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights last week. The location is great - near Plaça de les Glòries Catalanes which has a good, modern shopping centre. It is also within walking distance from the Sagrada Familia Basilica, the Marina and the Old Town.The hotel itself is modern and the room was comfortable and for once, even though the room is air conditioned, one was able to open the window for some fresh air!On the top (19th) floor there is a bar, seating and the swimming pool - which was not in service at the time of our visit. One has great views of the city from here and a nice view of the Sagrada Familia Basilica.The best part was the breakfast which was superb with a great choice - including churros!Nothing negative I can say about the hotel and quite reasonably priced.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Ok the check in was fine although no early check in allowed so expect to be waiting until 2pm if it’s busy. The neighbourhood seems ok. Food wise there are some reasonable restaurants in the shopping centre nearby and about 10 minutes walk there’s quite a few restaurants. The good bits are that you can get supplies for your room easily from the carrefour supermarket a few minutes walk away. There is a taxi rank opposite the hotel and so we had no problems with getting a taxi when we went out. The fare from the airport was about 30 euros by taxi. Inside the decor is nice and modern. The only downside is that there are only 3 lifts so at peak time there can be a delay to get a lift. I think the longest we waited was about 8 minutes. The restaurant was very good for breakfast lots of freshly made food and I would suggest well worth it as breakfast options outside seemed a little sparse. The restaurant opens for breakfast at 0700hrs. On our first night there we decided to have an evening meal in the restaurant but this was not so good. They open at 1900hrs, it’s very smart but the food was not great with the worst bit being my burger which after having a bite turned out to be very pink in the centre. They did take 3 euros off the €13 cost of the burger for that. I would eat out for meals apart from breakfast. All the staff were pleasant and most spoke English to some degree. The room itself was clean and smart. But they had no bath in the standard rooms. The bed had a good firm base which was very good for both myself and my wife as we suffer from poor backs. Soundproofing seemed good and we were not disturbed by any noise. So overall we were happy and would stay again.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Quite good hotel, located in nice area with an easy access to main roads. Plus: private parking, free of charge due to out of order ticket machine. Minuses: awful bedding and pillows, I couldn't sleep there well (synthetic pillows etc); staff at the reception was really slaw and did not give always the right and full information, like the time frame you need to give them to prepare take out breakfast.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Clean, tidy, friendly, ideally placed near Glories metro [L1] which takes you to most attractions. Huge choice for breakfast and good evening meal menu. Our room had great views towards Sagrada Familia.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here during an annual event, as always crazy hotel prices, my room only was 570€ . So I can tell you if it is value for money or not! 21€ for breakfast, no thank you ! Hotel is 5 minutes from the nearest Metro and over ground stations, with a taxi rank opposite.Room was clean, functional bathroom, quiet room, which is always a plus.Hotel is opposite a shopping centre, supper market and 10 of places to eat, I tried the Italian and it was OK.Would I stay there again, probably not !
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We spent 2 nights in one of the best room of Novotel. I have to admit that the view from it was superb. It's not easy to find something better in Barcelona. The professionalism of the staff was special, and the cuisine was perfect from breakfast to dinner. The Lunchroom has the presence of an open kitchen with show cooking, this is an added value. At the top of Novotel there's one of the most wonderful panoramic terrace I've ever seen before, with swimming pool and hydromassage, in a big sapce with relax area and gym. There's nothing better than relaxing in the pool after a long visit around the beauty of Barcelona, with an amazing view.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: First time I have stayed at a Novotel Hotel in years and was very pleased with the quality & service for the price. I normal;y stay at one of the large chains (of which I have been a member for many years) but there were no rooms available and the Novotel was in the location we wanted. Hotel is modern, staff were pleasant and helpful when we asked for some recommendations. My room was bright, spacious, clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again .
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nothing to fault. It’s clean. breakfast could have a bit more variety and the bar downstairs is closed during winter forcing you up to the exposed top floor for a drink. The gym equipment is dated and there should be water in the gym. Overall it’s ok and location is good with s good shopping centre across the road.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is my second time here at this hotel. Nothing really has changed since last year. There is never anybody at the priority check-in. As a gold member I did not feel welcome at all. Children running around the lobby, screaming, ect.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was really excited about this trip. The reviews for this hotel were great so what could go wrong?.. Boy! was I in for a surprise. I arrived to on January 15th with my cousin and sister, my reservation was for the 16th but we were going to stay in my cousins room for that night. I explained this to the front desk staff who for the most part was Ok but not Alba. she was rude from the beginning. My cousins room was advertised as "sleeps 4" when I told Alba she said it does but 2 of those "adults" have to be children (never heard of this before) I then continue to tell her then why is it advertise as adults, it should say children and being the rude person that she was she said that it is impossible for the site to say that (I booked through Expedia). She asked me "well what are you going to do?" and I said (at this point I am tired and annoyed with the fact that I have to go through this on my arrival) "you aren't giving me any choice so ill pay for a room. Having friends who work in Hospitality, once I arrived back home, told me that was my first mistake. I should have asked to see the room, clearly she was trying to make a sale. I pay for the room and she tells me multiple times "this room will not have breakfast included but the other room (my cousins) did" I said "fine, I don't really care about breakfast" She made sure she said it again while still being rude. We end up not having breakfast the next day because we woke up late, guess it worked out. On Friday the 18th we wake up early for breakfast and when they ask for our room numbers we give it to the person checking, my sister and I go in and when my cousin gives her her room number it tells her breakfast is not included on her reservation and will have to pay. I had to take a deep breath. When we were done we decided to deal with it once we got back from exploring the city. We asked one of the other girls working and she was no help, one of the guys actually took down our info and said someone will gt back to us..NOTHING. We end up leaving to Madrid as this was part of the trip and again said we would address it once back in the hotel. Jackpot, Alba was in the night we got back who is the person who gave us the information. she DENIED everything. She said she never told us breakfast was included, still on a very high horse and rude. I get it, deny, deny deny but wow! I started calling Expedia, she called us liars and how she has been working there for a long time and will never give the wrong information out, Ha! Little did they know I have family in Spain and briefly told them what was happening and the kind of treatment we were receiving. I asked Alba for a a complaint sheet, she moved quickly but not quick enough before I said and I want the town hall complaint sheet NOT the hotel one. Oh Alba, poor flustered self all of a sudden was shocked we knew what we were talking about. The manager came out, all of explained what has been happening with this particular employee and instead of giving us the benefit of the doubt actually just said to us "Alba has been with us since we opened and our guest have wonderful things to say about her" really?!!! I mean, NEVER have I experience this. The only thing she offered was a 50% off breakfast the next day, I said "oh great, we leave tomorrow". I filled out the sheet which is numbered and they have to give in to the town hall. I asked my family to follow up. I DO NOT recommend this hotel to anyone. The hotel itself was cute but the staff is absolutely HORRIBLE. I did not stay there for free, I payed for everything. Alba, red glasses and her permed red hair is ABSOLUTELY horrible and should not work in hospitality.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We wanted a modern hotel which was near shops and good value for money. This hotel was a very good find.The check in process was efficient and the hotel was 5 minutes walk from a mall which had good mid range stores and supermarkets. I was surprised as one reviostated that the shops were useless so not sure what they were looking for. There were no high end stores but those there were ok for the average person travelling with eateries if you did not want to pay the hotel prices.The beach is apparently a few minu away but as it was February we did not bother to look it up.The room was clean but had an awful smell which could only be described as smelly socks. This smell did not diminished the entire 2 nights of our stay and was very off putting. It was a shame as the shower was great and the overall appears of the room was clean. Well.....the carpet had seen better days!There were tea and a safe in the room and a lower point with a mirror (thank you God) most hotels have the power point in the opposite place to the socket which I don’t understand!We didn’t eat at this hotel so cannot comment I’m the food. There was a gym ( God is good) again as so many hotels lack one so I could work out and it was 24 hiours.... Hallelujah! It consisted of 2 running machines, 1 cross trainer, and 2 bikes. It also had a variety in sizes of free weights and mats for floor work. There as also a multi/gym apparatus which was just awful. Netherless a sufficient array of equipment for usage with no staff or reception area as the room key was used for access.The other annoying thing about the room was the noise the heating system made. It would always the dead..... literally. I found it hard to fall asleep but the bed was very comfortable so I didn’t have to listen to it too long before I dropped offf..... there is a God!The train statin was approximately 7 mins walk and getting into the centre was easy. A taxi cost €12-18. There was always a taxi waiting outside the hotel. Overall the hotel was good apart from the smell and the noise but I would definitely stay here again. The staff were very amiable and efficient and we were made to feel important which was an added plus to this hotel.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I have stayed at in this hotel many times before. Everything was perfect, friendly staff, good location and fair price.Special thanks to the front desk manager and the reception staff for upgrading my room to a nice suite.Will definitely stay again.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We came here as a couple for the weekend, the hotel check in was fast and staff very helpful and polite. Our room was lovely and felt luxurious, it was clean and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The roof bar and terrace area was fab and we’d love to come back when the weather is warmer to take full advantage of it. The hotel is situated in a great area to be able to access everything you need. Great shopping centre opposite, and metro close by giving you easy access to the rest of the city. And lots of other things to see.We went to Camp Nou, which was great even if you’re not much of a footie fan! We also went to St Joseph’s market, the gothic cathedral and wandered around that area all day, so much to see and do! We also visited some of Gaudí‘ swirl which is breathtaking.We highly recommend staying at this beautiful hotel and enjoying all that Barcelona has to offer.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Took my girlfriend to Barcelona for her 21st birthday and it was brilliant. This hotel is lovely, rooms are spacious comfortable modern and have amazing views. All the hotel staff were brilliant and the staff on the front desk helped us book a couple of things to do.When you come back in the evening you have plenty shops and restaurants across the road and you're right next to a pickup location for the city tour. Taxi cost €9 to the port and €8 to the centre, although the centre is only 20 minutes walk and plenty to see along the way.Stayed May 2018, it was around 22 degrees during the day and the bar and pool on the roof terrace are superb. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone travelling to Barcelona!
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Have been upgraded thanks to my gold membership status. Really feel like the fidelity programme works well. Therefore, I am quite happy to continue booking on Accor hotel and I hope that this benefit will continue.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location great a few minutes walk to the metro from where you can get anywhere. Hopon hopoff bus stops nearby. Nice, safe area. Big shopping centre just across the road with a big supermarket and all the usual shops and services. We stayed in a superior suite, the space itself was nice, had a living area with it's own tiny w.c. and separate bedroom. Nice big bathroom, walk in shower, double bath, double sinks. Magnifying mirror, hairdryer and all the toiletries, bathrobes and sippers. We had 2 televisions, English speaking channels were sky news and some American news channels. There was a nespresso machine so we could make coffee and tea, and a minibar fridge where you could store your own food too. We were given a litre of bottled water every day but they forgot to leave it on 2 occasions, we bought 5 litre bottles from the supermarket across the road anyway. There could have been a bit more hanging space and some drawers would have been nice, but there were just a couple of shelves.The decor could do with updating, while nothing wrong with it as such, it was very, very dark and the lighting was terrible. We were on the 8th floor, friends had a suite on the 17th and said exactly the same, not enough light in the living or bathroom. WThe breakfast was really good, plenty of choice for hot breakfast as well as continental, fruit, cereals, sweet pastries, juices. The staff were very friendly at all times. The lifts were problematic all the time, they took forever, you couldn't see on the floor where you were waiting where the lift was and was it coming or not. On several occasions they were not working at all and we had to be taken to the service/staff elevators. One evening the water stopped running, I called reception and was advised it would be on again in 30 mins, she told my friend 15 mins. In fact it wasn't on again before we went to sleep. The next day we were giving 2 small bottles of cava as an apology. We went to the rooftop bar twice and there was only us and 1 other set of guests but on each occasion the different bartenders seemed very stressed. I think there should have been at least on other bartender. As he was making 4 cocktails we had to wait quite some time to be served, he was apologetic and very nice though. Such a pity that the rooftop bar was not open on New Years Eve, we went up to watch the fireworks from across the city but the bar itself was closed.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Close to glories shopping centre and glories high building. Close to trams and trains. Although swimming pool gym and sauna were closed duringn winters wchich was not pre advised. Breakfast lay-out was amazing.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It's a nice hotel. Located on avinguda diagonal square. Rooms are big and good heating system tram. Buss and metro are very near. And a big mall is around with Burger King and KFC. The only draw back is that the hotel is hard to find by gps. We drove from nice France to Barcelona And it took us an hour to get the parking of the hotel since gps goes round and round close to hotel. It's 199 or 200 or 201 diagonal avenue depends on which side you are coming towards the hotel :) Another flaw is the lift. Hotel has many floors and loaded with people but Yh lifts are so occupied that it may take 10 minutes to wait to get the space in lift. We were here in December but sadly pool and sauna wasn't open. Guess they need to write that info over booking dot com. Since I wasn't aware of it. Highly recommended for people who want to search the city. Placa de catalunya. Gaudi home and port vell are near and can be approached by bussReception staff is helpful though poor in English :)
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at this hotel for a couple of days while visiting Barcelona. The location was terrific with the metro being a short walk away. This made it easy to access the rest of the city. There are lots of good restaurants right around the corner from the hotel for those who are interested in something outside.The staff were helpful and attentive, and even provided all the Le Club benefits and upgrades without being asked. The room itself was quite well appointed, comfortable and had a good view. We would be happy to stay here again.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall the hotel rooms & service were very good. Had to request for some basic amenities on arrival like lotion & conditioner.They had games for kids in the lobby but the Xbox games weren’t working.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed at this hotel for a long weekend for my hen do. We had an amazing time, our 3 rooms were all placed next door to each other and cleaned daily, breakfast was really lovely every morning & the pool area was fantastic, with a bar and plenty of sun beds. Thank you for a lovely stay!
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Location is away from main attractions.Rooms and bathrooms are small and very average.Breakfast is good.Dining options and service in restaurant are below par.Staff is helpful.The terrace area with swimming pool is nice.
hotelName:
26    Novotel Barcelona City
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 部屋は広め。バスタブあり。アメニティは最低限度。無料のコーヒーメーカーが室内にあるがうまく作動しないときがままある。WiFiは無料版と有料版があるが、有料版を選んでも（1日9ユーロ弱）、しばしば極端に遅くなるため、仕事で高速回線が必要なら他のホテルを選んだ方がよい。チェックイン手続きは素早かった。敷地内にショッピングセンターがあり、その地下にスーパーや食堂もある。どれもそれほど高級店ではないが十分おいしい。駅からも主要観光地からも離れていて、地下鉄でも乗り換えがしづらい場所にあるため、ここに泊まって観光をする場合は基本的にタクシー利用になると思う。タクシー乗り場はホテルの前にある。朝食は気の利かないビジネスホテルという感じ。Efficient and friendly staff. Minimum but enough amenities. Free coffee machine in the room (doesn't work often properly). Supermarket (caprabo) and shopping center (L'illa diagonal) very close to the hotel. Need to use taxi always. View from the room is another apartments' balcony. Paid WiFi runs slow very frequently and log-in system is not stable. Better to find other hotel if you need high-speed WiFi. Poor breakfast. Many good options to eat-in at the ground floor of the L'illa.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here at the end of our honeymoon in May. It is about 30 minutes from the airport. The staff is friendly and helpful. Our room was upgraded due to our honeymoon and we got champagne and strawberries which was a lovely touch. The room itself is large and clean, same with the bathroom. It is a bit outside of the centre of Barcelona however there is a tram you can catch or walk into town. Walking is about 40 minutes however we didn't mind it as we stopped in to restaurants on our way back and fourth. The hotel does have breakfast for about 25 Euros per person. We did it for one day and I wouldn't say it is worth it unfortunately. You could get breakfast at other places for cheaper. There is room service available as well which was decent - fast service. The hotel also has a spa which is a lovely feature, however when we booked our massages, the receptionist had written the wrong date and we had paid for in advance. So I would recommend getting it written down for your date and time as there doesn't seem to be a computer system that they put in appointments and do not pay before. We were able to get our money back but we had to double check when we checked out as we were told it would be taken off our bill and it had not been. In the end it worked out but I would just double check those few things. We had heard great things about the spa so we were disappointed we weren't able to use it. Overall the stay was nice. Would recommend it.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: the hotel is ok. nice staff at reception. rooms are big, bathroom has strange layout and shower is not functional. some design but discret. bed is confortable. breakfast os very good but i got crowds of people so not a great experience.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was in this hotel more than 10 times, hotel is on great position, just 3 tram station from Camp Nou if will go to football game, walking distance to center, ... Rooms are pretty big, very nice, internet coonectiot is good, garage parking is hige with normal size of garage. Breakfast is also really nice with lots of possiblities for everyone. But the best place is terrace bar, nice place to enjoy in time for yourself. Hotel to recommend to everyone
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Moved furniture in middle of night that kept me awake for two hours. When I complained they told me nothing could be done, I had to pack and move rooms. Noise continued again. As a seasoned traveler, I don't recommended this hotel!
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is located near shopping, restaurants and public transportation, It is an excellent value for the money and has a very nice breakfast buffet every morning. The restaurant and adjoining bar are also very good.The staff was friendly and helpful and the rooms were spacious with comfortable beds. I do not hesitate to recommend his hotel.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Business meeting in Barcelona and I had booked at NH Sans Hotel. Arriving there the room they gave me was so small and without a wind that I could not accept it. They had no other rooms and proposed me to stay in an other hotel close by. This was a fortunate thing, as the other hotel Constanza is much nicer. Rooms where spacious and comfortable. Nice terrace outside and service perfect. Rooms where a bout old but very clean.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here during the Christmas Holidays.The hotel is really nice, the room and the bathroom are big, the bed is large and comfortable to sleep.Breakfast is amazing, you can find a lot of desserts. It's like to be in a pastry shop.The staff is helpful and kind.The hotel is in the suburbs of Barcelona, easy to arrive to the center by 15 minutes walking to the L3 station metro.Easy to arrive from/to airport too.Neighborhood seems safe also at night.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I was surprised about the fairly bad service, from the reception to the room service and Don Giovanni restaurant which is completely insufficient.Someone wanted to order a special room service for me, after several times trying, he gave up. I have asked to change the pillow, no luck. I wanted to go to the roof terrace and the hotel staff (3 people) were not able to tell me how (I found out that only one lift takes you there). Late check out was not programmed. And finally, the restaurant is as normal as the bar next door but expensive as a Michelin star place. Ambience out of date, service very bad and the food as normal as any bar on the motorway.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for two nights after flying for almost two days! Very comfortable,Great staff, room was very good. The pool was shut down for maintenance which was a disappointment but just unlucky timing. The breakfast buffet was great!!!
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed with my family for 2 days. The hotel staff was friendly and quick to answer the queries. It has many facilities and we enjoyed our stay. The room was super clean and nearby, you can find good restaurants.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My husband and I came to this hotel last minute as our already booked booked hotel in Barcelona had no individual air conditioning in the rooms. So we booked our room at NH Collection a few minutes prior to arrival and luckily they had rooms available. Very friendly staff, decent size rooms and comfortable enough beds. They had everything we were looking for. The location also cannot be beat. I hear the breakfast is good too but we didn’t try it so I cannot attest to it.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel gives a good impression on arrival. Plenty of friendly staff. The room was of a good size and quality. The only negative was a window that didn't close properly so we could hear some street noise. The location is not 100% ideal if you are a tourist but if you want somewhere quieter than the busy centre, then it works well. The breakfast is excellent.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here 1 night during a business trip and I wish I could have stayed longer! Loved the stylish trendy design of the patio, corridors and the room. I had a very spacious room with the typical trendy concrete look of NH hotels. A very big comfy bed and a beautiful bathroom topped it all off. It reminded me of the NHOW hotel in Rotterdam (NL) where I stayed a few years ago. Breakfast was very good as usual at NH and staff was helpful. You can find restaurants and bars in the direct area.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Window was padlocked & room was very hot.Asked to change room & told hotel was full.Maintenance removed padlock but I discovered the heat control for the bathroom seems broken.Combined with the safety limit on the window only opening a crack, the room stayed too hot to sleepThis was in January, so I’d hate to stay here in Summer! A/C just seemed to blow air, but no ability to cool the room.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I satyed in Constanza in the end of December 2018 on New Year. This hotel is located rather far from center in a quite district near a large trade center. The city center is within a half an hour maximum by metro. The nearest metro station is a 15-20 minute walk from the hotel. Traditionally, Constanza presented the highest level of service (like everywhere in NH), very clean large rooms, delicious breakfasts and heartly welcome by staff at reception. We were leaving on 1 January and the lady at the front desk presented us a New Year cake - very nice ) We highly recommend Constanza same as many NH hotels. Next stop in NH will be in Venice in April 2019 - see you there! ))
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We appreciated all the extras little attentions and good services provided. The staff was amazing sharing happiness and professionalism. And the breakfast is excellent, fresh food and beautiful place. The Constanza was definitely our home away from home, and very well located! thank you
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I got in late. Early in the morning I order some breakfast at the 24 hours room service. They had several inconvenience to bring my juice. It was getting late I asked my organic yogurt with fruit to go. The juice that was supposed to be organic and natural was made with pineapple juice from a can!! They I had to get what they had that was not what it was on the room service menu. The yogurt to go I got it served with a fork not a spoon, and the fruit inside was cut too big to be able to eat it in my morning meeting. They try, but do not put them selves in the customer shoes. no anticipation, they are not prepare ....
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I am a regular business traveller to Barcelona and have experienced many different hotels in Barcelona. I have chosen to be a regular at the NH Constanza because of its proximity to my work and L’illa shopping centre, the consistency of its rooms and friendliness of its staff.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Nice welcome from the consistently helpful staff. Comfortable bed and a good sized room. Good quality bed-linen.Good location. A 2 minute walk to a mall with a few restaurants and a coffee shop and a wine shop. 10 minute walk to one of the hop-on, hop-off bus stops.Had a complimentary half bottle of wine for my birthday from the mini-bar.Enjoyable experience and would stay again.PS. They have a spa facility but we didn't try that. Overall, good value for money.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Would certainly stay again. Right between all the places I needed to go for business and pleasure. Very clean property with all the amenities I could need. While it's seemingly in a business district it was nice to be away from all the tourist traffic but still have all that accessible if wanted. Superb breakfast with wonderful staff.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Located right behind Lilla shopping mall in the business district. Excellent breakfast, wifi and rooms, amenities. Staff is very accommodating and polite- very much enjoyed staying at this location and commend the meeting staff for their professionalism and meeting all needs of our meeting.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel was good but would have appreciated a little more help from the reception staff in terms of our luggage as we came in really tired after a long flight. Next day also they were pretty clueless on how we could take the Hop on hop off. I felt understanding English was a problem.Nice clean hotel but sure I think, look at other options. The location is also pretty much out of all the happening areas.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The goodA+ Quality bedA Quality roomQuiet, rooms are very well insulated Friendly and helpful staffThe badSuper expensive minibar (almost €12 for a small bottle of water and one small bag of crisps). This is extra scam like because they do provide free Nespresso on the room but the water from the tap is not potable so you need to buy water for €5,5 to get your free coffee. Whoever thought this was the way to go forward should have been fired by now..Location is on outskirts of Barca. Takes 43min to get to centre with public transportation or 25 min with taxi
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel has everithing you need in your vacations. Excellent locations. The hotel well appointed. Clean, very nice staff and restaurants with very good menu of varied meals.The welcome of the staff was very nice.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is very conveniently located in the heart of the business district while also easy to get to the best tourist sites (there is a taxi queue right outside the hotel). The breakfast buffet is slightly pricey, but well worth it in quality and variety. Room amenities were as expected.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed here for two nights while attending a conference held in the same location. The hotel is in Les Corts area of Barcelona, around 15-20 minutes from downtown, but there are plenty of restaurants in the area and the hotel is right next to a mall (in case you wanna indulge in retail therapy).The rooms are quite airy and minimalistic in terms of decoration. All bathrooms have a bathtub, which is a plus for me. Beds are super comfy and really offer a good night sleep. I didn't try any of the hotel restaurants so I can't comment on them.In general, I would say it´s a very good option to stay in Barcelona if you don't mind being a bit far from downtown and most of the historical attractions the city has to offer.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This hotel is not in the centre of Barcelona but is only approximately 15 minutes by cab.We stayed here the last time we were in Barcelona and we are sure that the quality of the hotel more than makes up for the slight inconvenience of not being right in the centre of town.The hotel is modern and very clean. The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly, nothing is to much trouble for them. The outside bar is relaxing and perfect for a quiet drink in the evening.The housekeeping staff always greet you with a big smile as do the reception staff. The bar staff always seem to have time for a brief chat are always happy to help.I highly recommend this hotel.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Stayed here because of a conference held on location. The room was modern, clean, spacious, well-lit and minimalist in decoration. Not sure if there is A/C (didn't need it) but window opens a crack. My side faced the street, which can be a bit noisy. The other side of the hotel faces a park, which seems quite nice. The breakfast buffet is generous and plentiful.The swimming pool on the roof is a bit small, but no one else was there when I went. For one person swimming laps, it was more than adequate.There is no dedicated concierge, but the reception more than covers the function in helping with reservations for restaurants and sights.The only down side is that the location is about a 40-minute walk to all the major sights. The area itself, however, does not lack good restaurants.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Excellent modern boutique hotel in a busy city location with all amenities close by. Being right next to L'Illa shopping centre means excellent connections to the rest of the city by bus, tube or trams. The (free) rooftop pool/terrace is an excellent feature and not too busy early morning/evening. Our room was large and comfortable with two joined double beds which were firm yet comfortable and the room had a mini-bar/fridge and all the features you could reasonably need. Again the large spacious bathroom featured a great selection of toiletries, powerful spacious shower and a massive separate bath.All staff we met were happy, cheerful and professional, in particular a big thankyou to Eduardo at reception for sorting the early check-in, before 1pm on a Saturday. We didnt get to dine at the hotel unfortunately, that said there is a great variety of cafes, bars and restaurants nearby to suit all tastes.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed in the hotel for 7 nights. Excellent service, excellent staff, wonderful breakfast! The room was spacious. comfortable and clean. Any problems were dealt with within minutes. Great location. Thank you for the lovely stay.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed 3 nights in constanza,great location for easy acces to the diffrent points of the city,very close to nuo camp stadium,very kind and polite staffs,very clean room,fantastic breakfast,beyond our expectation by considering the economic price.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Had a great stay for four nights in July at this hotel - and one of the best hotel breakfast buffets I have ever experienced, expensive but well worth the money. Would definitely recommend to anyone travelling to Barcelona (although quite a distance to the attractions) the hotel was great. Bedrooms were superb, with the best black out blind facilities I have ever seen. The only downside was the pool was so busy we tried three times over our stay to go and every time there was insufficient seating and pool space for us, so we used the spa, which was unmanned. We were unaware this was not included in our rate, and eventually a member of staff approached us to inform us that we could either leave or pay a fee for the facility, which we were happy to do - just wish we had been informed in advance at check in. Another positive was the hotel restaurant looked superb, but unfortunately we didn't get a chance to use it. However, we did have room service one night - which was incredible! Overall a superb hotel.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: From the minute we step foot into the hotel, there was no one to greet us- no one said hello/how are you/or anything of that sort. There was no bell boy and we had to bring our bags to our rooms ourselves. Our rooms were not even ready or cleaned. I have traveled and stayed at many resorts and hotels- this is the first time where the reception staff have not engaged in conversation with me. When I entered no one smiled or said hello. No one asked if we needed a taxi. I was so shocked.The only reason I am giving it two stars is because the ladies during the morning breakfast buffet were so kind and helpful. I would not recommend this hotel to any of my friends or family. Try to be more friendly with your guests. It would make their experience enjoyable.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Overall, the hotel is beautiful. However, they really need to pay attention to details in both service and design:- My wife and I were having a night out on the town and specifically reserved to have a room with a double bed (not two single beds), and this was clearly reflected on our reservation confirmation. Check-in initially went smoothly but when we got to the room we were surprised that the room didn't have a double bed but rather two single beds. We went back to the reception desk and explained the problem, at which point the clerk nonchalantly told us that they didn't have any available rooms with double beds and they only took "requests" for bed type. We we pointed out that our Hotwire confirmation specifically stated that we had a reservation for a room with a double bed (not a "request" for a double bed). After a bit of back and forth, they said they could upgrade us to a premium room that did happen to have a double bed, but only if we paid an extra 12 euros. Huh?!? - Our bathroom had a stylish but impractical design feature -- a window all along the top of the wall between the bathroom and the bedroom. Which means that if your spouse is sleeping and you make a trip to the bathroom in the middle of the night, go into the bathroom and (after closing the door) turn on the bathroom light -- your spouse gets rudely awakened by the bright light coming through from the bathroom.Otherwise, the hotel was quite nice. Comfortable firm beds, quality bedding, etc.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at NH Constanza for 8 nights and we enjoyed most of the things about this property. I have to give maximum points to the staff (all from reception to breakfast) - very helpful and courteous. The best breakfast buffet I had in any hotel. The pool was small but quite nice and staff serving fruits there was just a bonus. Few negatives: The corridor to reach the room was quite mediocre. I was not impressed with that. There was no place to keep the shampoo/shower gel in the shower area. Not something i would expect in 4 star hotel. But all in all, we enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend this place for families.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the Hotel for 9 nights in July. Nice room and a friendly staff. The swimmingpool area were a bit crowded at times, but the area was nice and calm with comfortable sunbeds. Extra points for serving free fruit there several times per day.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We had an awesome time in this hotel, from the infrastructure through out their staff which exceeded our expectations. Great and delicious breakfast buffet. The staff in the breakfast area are so helpful and makes your stay enjoyable. The ladies always welcomed us with a great smile, and coffee, and drinks as they quickly learned our favorite drinks!Patrice and Montse at the front desk were so helpful and patience with our concerns and gave us excellent advise on how to manage ourselves in the City as well as great places to eat, so helpful and humble ladies.The room and the entire facility were very cleaned and up to date. The A/C is super cold and comfortable as it was very hot in Barcelona, great arrange of drinks and dry fruits in their room fridge, good size room and very comfortable bed.Thank you from Manny & Omar, room 513.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: All good and great. From the reception staff which is extremely friendly and helpful to the great premium rooms spacious clean and very well equipped to the rooftop pool the conference rooms the bar the Italian restaurant and the well equipped breakfast buffet. Muchas gracias por todo estuba fantastico
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We lodged for 9 days in the junior suite - the room was amazing, very spacious with two TVs which comes handy when you have a kid that wants to watch cartoons the whole time. I really appreciated the Nespresso machine in the room.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at the NH Constanza for 4 nights and were very pleasantly surprised with the ease of check-in, standard of the room, knowledge of the staff including ability to converse in English and the amazing variety for the breakfast. Our overall experience with the hotel was very good and will recommend anyone to stay at the place if travelling to Barcelona
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed here for 4 days, before and during an Insight Vacation tour. This is a beautiful, well kept, hotel with modern, large rooms, with a great shower and bathroom. The closets were well organized for storing all our things and the bed was very comfortable. The rooftop pool was a nice perk and the breakfast was exceptional. We took advantage of many good restaurants in the area, enjoyed the very nice mall behind the hotel and the nice park for the children. The hotel staff was friendly and accommodating.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Please note I did not visit in June and indeed will not be visiting.I booked a room for August a month ago. My request was for a double room (the offered room rate was for a twin or double room). Today I received a notification advising “Unfortunately we cannot guarantee the type of the bed because it is subject to the availability of the hotel.”1. What poor inventory management2. Why wait a month to tell me?My wife and I would never choose nor accept twin beds.I have therefore cancelled my reservation and have booked an alternative hotel that understand customer service.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Was there for bachelor party! Well located, The room was okay, would need some refurbishments though.Bathroom was not super clean, they offer both a walk-in shower + bathtubSpacious room, we only slept 5h so okay.Breakfast was nice, and late so cool!
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had a quiet room on the top floor as I requested. It costs extra to use the pool. Hop off and on is nearby. On my birthday they sent a small dessert and a bottle of water. The breakfast buffet was excellent with excellent service.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For a four-star hotel, and even for a five-star hotel, the service is beyond exceptional--everyone is willing to do whatever it takes to make one's stay wonderful. The hotel is on a reasonably quiet street, and you can get rooms facing a small park and the shopping center that would face no traffic at all. Although not in the center, the location is excellent. The rooms are well-designed as well as being good sized. The suite is 2 bedrooms, 2 1/2 baths, and is exceptionally well laid out. You can not do better in Barcelona.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A recent short trip to Barcelona and was very impressed with this hotel. They could not have been more accommodating and allowed my son needed to leave his bike box there prior to our arrival. The breakfast was very good and there was a lot of choice and the staff were very efficient in removing used plates etc.I'd certainly recommend this hotel and would stay there again.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Well placed location for shopping and for business. From a work point of view the room was very comfortable which a work station area. Breakfast was good choice and quality.Priced well too. Would recommend!
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: KI have been two tmes to this hotel and I must say that for both stays I was very glad. The hotel is well located and the staff is very kind and helpfull. The room very cean and offer a sleep of a good quality
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I had an amazing weekend by myself in this hotel!The spa is small but the facilities are great and the staff is really nice.I order the room service and the food is not bad, a bit over priced but the lady who served me is really , really nice.The rooms is very spacious and the bathroom as well. And I liked the decoration!The breakfast is one of the best I ever had in hotels! Just really good, amazing and super fresh.I had two small problems:1 - Check in - the Front Desk clerk Maria didn't smiled once at me, neither asked how I was, not very polite. I mean, is hospitality industry... At least a smile would be nice. Meanwhile, I notice other Front Desk clerk named Karla and she looked sooo friendly!2 - I woke up at 5am because my couple that were on the next room, didn't shut up! The sound proof could be much better
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Before I arrived I had a great communication with the staff. They have been very nice to us. Is a very clean hotel, service has been very good. Staff answered all our questions and helped us with anything. The hotel is right behind Lilla's Mall, a couple of meters from Ave. Diagonal, main avenue in Barcelona. It has a couple of metro and subway stations within walking distance.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel in good condition, bathroom needs some attention. The location was good. checking-in was very very slow and I had to complain, the extra staff help took 5 minutes. Air-conditioning control needs to be more user friendly
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is in a great location with great access. Friendly staff and lots of attention to details. The rooms are nice and big with things you would need such as a desk, television, mini bar, shower and bath.
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Liked the clean rooms and nice service personel, whom all speak English. One little remark, the complementary shampoo is horrible and stript my hair like an industrial cleaner, definitely do not wash your hair with that stuff... The hotel really should change that for something soft en better quality, but otherwise very nice stay!
hotelName:
27    NH Collection Constanza
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is quite cosy and is situated in a perfect location in Barcelona. However, a few small details could be improved. I liked the location in the town:)I liked the bed:)Smell of the bakery in the morning:)Better option for breakfast for vegetarian ;)Better place for reception.Would be great with a small water cooker needed.Would be great with a small fridge.Will recommend to others.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hotel is quite cosy and is situated in a perfect location in Barcelona.However, a few small details could be improved. For example, the rooms disposition doesn’t allow for enough privacy in the bathroom, no water heater is available, as well as no fridge or minibar.Sixt floor inner side was quite quiet.On some occasions the bakery smell gets a bit overwhelming and nauseating.Actually all the small discomforts would be perfectly tolerable on a lower price range.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Wonderful, contemporary place to stay in great location with delicious cafe & breakfast available. Loved the minimal room and simple details. Would stay again and recommend it to others, too. Look forward to staying in future.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Check in was hit & miss, reception is in an odd place really, you have to walk past the counters full of beautiful pastries,breads etc & depending on time of day pretty well full on chaos with people queuing to order, waited a good 5 mins for someone at reception so asked bakery staff (in limited Spanish) for help which all 3 staff were totally not interested, they thought it was amusing as all were talking & laughing about us. Not a good start. Staff member finally arrived & a quick checkin & into our room.Room smallish but already was aware of that, very clean, great bedding, pillows & towels also very good, Complimentary shampoo & conditioner, moisturiser, no glasses only plastic cups & no fridge, very good aircon as extremely hot on our stay. We had breakfast one morning & ticks all the right boxes as breakfast goes. You can also just order coffees & pastries/ toasted sandwiches from bakery & bring them into cafe/breakfast area in Hotel if you want. Hotel is in a fabulous location, many bars/tapas & restaurants in this area. Easy walk to main tourist areas where you can catch hop on/off buses. Taxis can be easily caught at corner of street on your right of Hotel. Recommendation to Hotel maybe changing reception sign to the front of bakery to stop confusion. Had a great time in Barcelona, lovely City.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Adorable, smallish hotel on a major street. The bustling bakery downstairs has delicious pastries, sandwiches and coffee. Staff is friendly and speaks English. Room was very clean, bright and the perfect size for me as a single. A couple would be comfy as well. The room is small, but who cares?? Americans seeking an American sized hotel room need to stay in a Marriott hotel. The bed was amazing and linens crisp. Bathroom was compact but updated. Large shower with separate toilet; a pocket door separates this from the bed. Bright window lead to a Juliette balcony. Blackout drape was provided. A/C was adjustable, but I didn’t need to lower it even as temperatures outside climbed to 90F. Towels were soft and replaced each day; safe under the sink.This is a modern, bright, European style hotel. The location is fantastic for those wanting to site see or just stroll through the neighborhoods. Closest to La Pederera; Casa Batlo; Passeig Gràcia; Casa Vincenz; 20 minute walk to Sagrada Familia. Really lovely experience and having the working bakery downstairs was a treat for both the eyes and the appetite!
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Super cute hotel, with an amazing bakery on the ground floor. Location is excellent! Very comfortable stay, no issues with cleanliness. The staff was nice. We did have an issue with the air conditioning, it kept automatically switching to 27 degrees. However, after alerting the staff they handled and fixed it directly. Overall a perfect stay!
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We loved this hotel! Couldn’t rave about it more, great vibes, aesthetic and location! The bakery was so convenient and delicious, the smell of fresh bread and pastries lingered through the mornings and this was a delight. The location was great, felt very safe and secure but also not to busy or touristy either! Overall would recommend to friends and family, and would stay again in the future.Our only slight downside was that we couldn’t put subtitles on the tv - to English - so we muddled through on our limited Spanish. And there was no fridge / ice buckets available for a cool drink through the evening / mornings.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We stayed at for 3 nights prior to a Western Medeterranian Cruise. The location was excellent, and the neighborhood wonderful. We were slightly off the beaten path, so the area was quiet, but we were very near bus and metro stops. The room was small, but perfect for sleeping and well kept. No chairs or places to sit other than the bed. The bathroom area could be closed off with a barn door and the shower was lovely. The staff were very kind and helpful, although we did have a mis-understanding about the "free neighborhood tour", we were told it was around an hour, but it was more like 3 hours. Felt like we found a hidden gem, would recommend this hotel to everyone.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The price and cleanliness stand out and the smell of freshly baked bread tops it off. The rooms are a bit small but they are very clean. The location of the hotel is perfect, right around the corner from shopping, Plaça Reial, and a taxi stand across the street. The bakery is phenomenal! There are a few tables in the front open to the public but the entire back are is dedicated to hotel guests. I would highly recommend!
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Good location, clean and comfortable rooms (if a little small... the shower was almost half the size of the bedroom, design team did not get that quite right). Although decor was crisp and attractive, it seemed a bit like style over substance.The smell of freshly baked bread in the morning is a dream to wake up to, sets the hunger pangs into action on opening your eyes! The coffee was the most delicious we tasted in Barcelona, which is a huge positive, but also the biggest negative, the breakfast which is supplied by the hotel included a coffee from a Nespresso machine, which is a little gimmicky. Not even a fresh pot. When we asked the reception staff, the lady said that the coffee was ‘supplied by a separate company, and was not included in the price of the breakfast’ this was a huge disappointment, surely this could be negotiated with the company...? We ended up buying our coffee separately. They were clearly able to supply the baked goods as part of the breakfast, so why not the coffee? It felt as though they really could not be bothered. Paying customers at the hotel, having to pay for the coffee separately is not an acceptable package. Not a complete customer oriented experience. The cafe was also closed on Monday, which we were not advised of, we came down to check out and to pick up a croissant to go, and the whole of downstairs was closed, again, disappointing - should be made aware of this if offering ‘breakfast’.Not terrible, but would not visit again.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I want to preface this review by stating I am a high maintenance American female. This review may not be helpful for everyone, but if you are also a little high maintenance, this maybe just what you need. The hotel is a legit bakery. You wake up every morning smelling fresh baked bread and pastries, which could be a good or bad thing. For me, I didn’t mind it. My room faced the back of the hotel, but I’ve heard from coworkers, if you are faced in the front of the hotel, you most likely be woken up around 3-4 am by the delivery trucks being unloaded. The room itself was extremely small. When I first entered it, I HATED, but it has grown on me. If this had been a personal trip, rather than for business, my husband would have never of fit. The first day, I had asked for extra hangers. The 5 provided in the room wouldn’t cut it for my 2 week work stay. They said they didn’t have any extra, which I found strange since they do offer laundry service. Not a huge deal, but slightly annoying. The first 2 nights my toilet ran the ENTIRE night. Until I figured out how to tap the small flush panel just right, it would have run the entire time. Annoying for me, costly for the hotel. The one thing that would persuade me to never stay at this hotel again is the fact that you can not control the temperature in your own room. It is controlled by the hotel. Every night I had to request the manager to turn up my AC. I run HOT, sleeping in 23 degree conditions just doesn’t work. Even when he turned it up, it still never got cold enough. He was super nice and helpful though, told me to call down if I didn’t notice a difference and he would have someone come look at it. I noticed the slightest difference, but it just still wasn’t cold enough. Overall, the staff is extremely nice and very accommodating. I arrive at 11 am, when check in wasn’t until 4 pm, and they still allowed me to get into their only available room. I am here on business for 2 weeks and was only able to get into this hotel for 6 days, so they obviously do really well, it just wasn’t for me.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Not sure what we got into but staying above an awesome bakery was wonderful. Pastries and sandwiches were delicious. The hotel was sufficient. Not a huge room but who hangs out in the room. A little tight when you are hanging for a week.Neighborhood was great with plenty of dining options walkable. We did walk 30 minutes to several sites of interest.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Hotel was clean and comfortable and the cafe with bakery downstairs amazing and convenient. Would thoroughly recommend. The neighbourhood is also very safe and close to the shopping district. Would stay here again for sure!!
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This was a great location, and the style of the room was nice and modern, though small, but with a nice shower. Only real problem was that you couldn't control the temperature at night and it got warm.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: We requested a king size bed and, although the bed was spacious enough, it wasn't a real king since it was actually two smaller beds put together with a pad over both, so the space between them was evident when the beds separated slightly at night, making it somewhat uncomfortable. We would like to book again since we loved the location and the bakery downstairs, but as far as the bed is concerned, do you offer any real kings or are all of them only two beds put together?
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The room was very clean. Though it was small, all the key points were met for my needs. Very nice rainfall shower head with good water pressure, a large window that opens, and high ceiling made up for the smallness for the room. The best part is that we woke up to the aroma of freshly baked pastries every morning!!!
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My wife and I stayed at Praktik for 2 nights based on reviews and location. The hotel is located in a nicer region of Barcelona. High end clothing shops and hotels surround the hotel. We enjoyed being away from the general tourist areas which are accessible through the cities abundant taxi service. The staff (special thanks to Mary) were exceptional. Extremely helpful, attentive and efficient. Cons; The rooms are small with not too many amenities. This was not important to us personally but for some it might be.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This small hotel was perfect for my week in Barcelona. It has been refurbished and now has a funky, modern vibe. A fun quirk is the bakery in reception, where you can see the bakers busily producing the days bread and delicious patisseries. Then you can buy the bakery goods and ready made salads and coffee at the bakery counter which adjoins reception. However, if you just want unadorned fresh bread to do your own catering, you need to go round the corner to the shop itself, where you can buy fresh loaves and bread by weight. There is a breakfast buffet but I didn't try it, preferring to cater for myself. Happily the hotel doesn't mind of you are a guest and bring your own food to the dining room. My room had french doors with a little railling so you coule look out and see Sagrada Famiglia further down the street. It was about 20 minutes walk away. Casa Mila is on the next corner from the hotel. Very convenient location with most things within walking distance.My room was lovely. All clean and white. It was a grrat size for one. The only downside is that there is no tea and coffee facilities in the room. But forewarned is forearmed and I took a jug and teabags with me from NZ.I really liked staying here.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: For my wife and I, this was our first trip to Barcelona and were a bit concerned when booking our hotel where it would be located and how close to the major attractions it would be, and this hotel did not disappoint. It is 1 block from Casa Mila and one of the major high-end shopping districts, along with reasonable walking to Playa Catalunya and La Rambla. There's also a city tour bus stop within 2 blocks. Beyond the location, the check-in process was quick, the wi-fi was fast, and the food from the bakery was great and affordable. We would definitely stay at this hotel again in the future as the only negative we noted was that we couldn't get the thermostat to work so our room got a bit warm at night.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This little hotel is in a great location much is walkable and the subway is very very convenient and easy to useroom was large for european standards and shower was terrific.staff was quite helpful and the breakfast (add'l fee) was quite good
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: You'll find this boutique style hotel only a 5 minute walk from the main road. Using public transport from the airport was no issue in our quest to find the hotel. First impressions where very good, the entrance is filled with cakes and freshly made bread from the bakery, it's clear the bakery is a popular destination amongst tourists and locals. The room was very well designed, although smaller than anticipated; but this wasn't an issue. The use of this intricate space seemed very clever. We had a large double bed covered in white bedding. There wasn't a spec of dust or dirt to be found anywhere. The view from the balcony is a nice compliment to the room.The staff in the hotel are very helpful, they will be able to provide you with directions, transport links, tourist information and off course they can give you great recommendations on which pastries taste the best. Like most places, you can store your luggage when you check out. I'd definitely stay here again. Hotels in Barcelona can be fairly expensive, but this hotel offers a very competitive option. Tip: The bakery downstairs does serve the public as well as hotel guests. They reserve a few tables for guests in a morning but due to its popularity it can be difficult to get a seat; arrive early for the best pastries and seats.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This little gem is convenient to all the “must-see” areas of Barcelona. While the rooms are small, the affordable price and great location more than compensate for the size. The delicious pastries and sandwiches in the bakery are definitely a plus.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: This is a great place to stay. With a bakery downstairs close to old town but still away from the crowds. Centrally located to Gaudi first house, his summer house in Garcia and the cathedral. I would stay here again when visiting the area.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stopped at the recommendation of a friend. I had a delicious sandwich and also indulged in a pastry. Both were quite good. The location was great as I was walking from Família Sagrada back to my hotel. It was busy, and finding a place to sit was a little challenging, but that’s a testament to its popularity.
hotelName:
28    Hotel Praktik Bakery
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: 4 of us spent 3 days in Barcelona at the end of a long cruise. A friend familiar with Barcelona recommended an area to stay in that was central to many of the great sights and we selected the Praktik Bakery. To be honest, the thought of a bakery at the ground floor of our hotel helped seal the deal. Bakeries are so hard to find in the USA these days.What an amazing place! It was not just a bakery, but the best one around - we know because we tried others during our walking around. But, we all know the purpose of a hotel stay is also the room.
