My room also had a balcony with a view. Great job!
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: My days in Barcelone was amazing. Part of this was because Yeah Hostel. It was the right decision. They have a good price, also a confortable modern and clean room. They offer many solutions to hang out and know the city during the day. Breakfast is amazing. Staff is friendly and speak many languages, like portuguese spanish english etcEverything was good and I don't have nothing to complain. They should open in Bristol or London, we need :)
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great Hostel in Barcelona. Very good staff that will give you tips about the city. All the details are very well thought-out. Big lockers, plugs and lights in every bed. Good comon areas: bar, chill-out area and kitchen. Everything was very clean! Thanks!
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Beautiful hostel with great attention to detail stayed here for 4 nights total. The rooms are of pristine cleanliness with comfortable beds, big lockable drawers for your bags and towels to rent for 3 euros.Very busy hostel with a lively kitchen/ dining room and cosy hangout area but surprisingly the sound doesn’t travel up to the rooms.Everything is easy to get to from here with Gaudí’s works on your doorstep and elsewhere less than 30 mins walking or easy metro journey.The staff here are incredibly helpful with 24 hour front desk, free and informative walking tours every day and breakfast and dinner daily. The sociable and inclusive atmosphere they create makes it easy to meet other solo travellers.Honestly would not hesitate to stay at this amazing hostel again. Happy travels here!
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I spent 3 days in this hostel and it was absolutly wonderful.Such a great environment to meet people.The staff is super friendly, helpful and knowledgeable about their city.The rooms are super clean.For 3 euros, the breakfast is more than fair.The location is great and well desserved by transportI won't hesitate to go back to Yeah hostel!
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great for a solo stay. I took advantage of the breakfast one day, well worth the 3 euro. The staff were welcoming and enthusiastic. Lots of activities (walking tour, club crawl, breakfast, and dinner) that you can enjoy with other guests. Rooms are updated and tidy. The shared lounge space and rooftop terrace offer spaces to rest up outside of your room. Fantastic, affordable stay.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Out of my expectations. Super friendly staff, clean n spacious rooms, cozy lounge and rooftop is very nice. 100% recommend! There are a number of restaurants and cafes for food. Quite close to metro station.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I stayed two nights in this nice clean hostel that somehow was much better a hotel for me..It was a clean, beautiful hostel. Everything was well organized for guests. What I liked most about was its beds.they have privacy space with big boxes. The mattress was new camper to those all hostels I’ve stayed yet and couldn’t sleep well due to their damaged mattress. Breakfast was ok consider to the money you’re supposed to pay(3€). Receptionists were kind and helpful...I really enjoyed my stay in this hostel and whenever I go to Barcelona no doubt about it I just go there
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Yeah Hostel has probably ruined me for all other hostel stays. The staff were great, really friendly, remembered peoples names and very knowledgeable. I was in a 4 bed female dorm and the drawers for luggage are big and take an overflowing backpack with room to spare, the individual bed locker was a great idea, the privacy was appreciated and the beds were comfy. The shower could be a bit bigger. The communal areas were good and having a table to work at was really appreciate (something I look for now at other hostels). My only complaints comes from inconsiderate roommates but that's not reflection on the hostel.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The best hostel I´ve ever stayed at. The staff always makes the guest feel at home,the amenities are so clean and comfy and the hostel is good located near 2 metro stations and some blocks away from sigthseen spots, restaurants and clubs.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Great location, 10 minutes walking to Sagrada Familia and a few meters to the subway.The staff is very friendly and offers information about the city.The hostel organizes dinners and night events every night. Wi-Fi didn't work from our room but it works in common areas.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: It was one of the finest places in Barcelona,Excellent and professional staff,Very good restaurant compared to the price,Clean Rooms Superior features quiet, comfort and well being,Very close to the metro station,There are several supermarkets nearby,When I get back to Barcelona it will be my first choice,Thank you very much Yeah team for the fun time,I enjoyed it a lot
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: this hostel is ahnds down one of the best hostel in barcelona. the location, hostel activities, rooms, comfy bed and cleanliness of the hostel is all upto the mark.the staff go beyond to help the guest at the hostel.the walking tour organised by the hostel is a must go.they also have night outs to the pubs and clubs,(dont miss this outing)breakfast is excellent (3 euros) and so is dinner (12 euros)will definitely recommend this hostel to friends.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel was really easy to get to from the airport and situated in a more local area than in the tourist area. We really liked the feel of the area and it only took 15 minutes to walk to Las Ramblas. The hostel itself is very clean and airy. We stayed in a female 4 bed dorm with ensuite. The beds we comfortable and the lockers under the bed were huge. Shower and toilet were separate which is great when sharing. We did not have the breakfast because of dietary requirements but it was good value for what was on offer. Little bonus of the hostel was the roof terrace, just perfect to relax in after a day of walking. Overall we had a really good stay and would recommend it to our friends that may visit Barcelona.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: Best Hostel I have ever stayed in! Staff is amazing, accommodation is great, beds are comfortable, the place in new and clean. My friend and I took the free walking tour guided by Alberto, it was great, he was super fun and had quite a few things to tell and show. We stayed in 4 person mix dorm, the lockers for the suitcases are huge, you could easily fit a few suitcases in. The bathroom is clean and new. You have a small locker on the bed where you can put your phone in at night to charge and it has a bedside lamp.Don't forget to bring your own locks Like any other hostel it can be a bit nosy but the staff is very diligent in reminding people to keep the noise level down after 11pm. Location wise, it easily accessible with public transport, only a 20 min walk from plaza cataluyna and in a safe neighborhood. I would recommend this Hostel.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: I decided to book this hostel purely off the good review which I initially changed from another hostel located in the Gracia area. Decided to stay for 5 nights, in the middle of the Catalunya government almost declaring independence for the state.I took the train from the airport to the passeig de gracia stop, got off apposite the Casa Batilo whereby the metro is located. The line to Verdaguer is only 2 tops away but the walk can be exhausting especially for the elderly or people with young children.Checking into the hostel was very swift even though i arrived early Albert was very accommodating. You have to pay 5 euros as a deposit and 2 euros for the rental of towels which you allowed to changed just once during your stay. You get given a wristband which allows you to access your room with room number noted on there just in case you get a sudden bout of amnesia.I was staying in a mixed 4 bed room which was very clean with big under bed lockers, clean toilets and good size shower room.The main lounge area is located on the first floor, I personally didnt spend anytime there mainly people on smartphones, tablets and laptops just chilling out.On the 7th floor which is the rooftop has a pool if you fancy dipping your feet in there and having a beer then its the perfect place! The views to the mountains are exception especially at night time.They do breakfast each morning for the price of 3 euros. Being a vegan the options were good, they do gluten free cornflakes with soya milk and fruit too.Also walking tours begin at 10.30am meeting in reception, no charge just tip the rep once the tour is completed but each day they do different tours. It was very insightful, i hopped on the gothic tour, Alberto who was a great guy made the experience very enjoyable and interesting so definitely recommend that. Each night you can put your name down for a meal before 7 so the chef can cook accordingly. I know they do bar crawls but i didnt go on one or meal so cannot comment.The area itself is well positioned with a small shop and tobacco place literally outside the hostel. Opposite the hostel you can walk towards the main area of Gracia which is a very cool place with loads of boutiques, tapas bars, vegan shops and restaurants.l literally walked everywhere from the hostel to the Sagrada, casa mila, ramblas, near the port and gothic quarter all in one day.Jaume I is the main metro to take back to the hostel, Verdaguer line which is only 4 stops away.Thoroughly enjoyed my stay in Barcelona and Yeah hostel, met so many nice people which provided the basis to make my stay feel extra comfortable and relaxed.Excellent place!
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: The hostel is really great designed and clean. Beds gives you some privacy and you have anything you need (plug, own lightning etc.) beds and pillows are very comfortable. You will love it. The point is dinner, breakfast, night acrivities are paid. If you want to join hostels activities you will have to pay some extra money. Rest of it is awesome.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: PLACEThe Hostel was super clean, very well done up and felt posh like a 3-4 star hotel.The kitchen is large and clean, the pub/dining area is again comfy and well done up.Rooms are refreshing with large comfy beds. Each room has a seperate toilet and shower room. Mirror, tables, everything has been taken care of.The common area is on the first floor and is again comfy and good place to chill. There's a beautiful rooftop lounge with a small swimming pool as well, comes with a view.PEOPLEThe staff was super nice and funny! (The passport photo they take for records is like a selfie and super funny) The people staying here were also super nice when compared to several creepy people at other hostels i stayed on my trip in Spain.FOOD & NIGHT TOURThe dinner at night was delicious.They had an open bar. I also went on the night tour and pub crawl. They arranged pre-drinking and chatting session in the dining area before the tour. 22 euros is a steal(includes metro ride, 2 hours pre drinking, free drinks at clubs/pubs. Had an amazing time with the people from the hostel.MORE- I had a little mishap and sprained my leg in Barcelona. The hostel staff was very helpful,They called the ambulance for me at 2-3 in the night, gave me a new room with a lower bunk, were proactive and asked if i needed something the next day.- Post checkout you can keep your luggage in their large cloak room for free.- Hostel is very very safe- Plenty of cafe's and shops nearby
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: my boyfriend and I spent 4 days there and it was simply amazing.The bed in the dorm have curtains, so it's easy to sleep and the ensuite bathroom was nice to have. Maybe a common one on the floor would have been useful, but the dorm was for 4 people so I never had any problem.But what made the hostel perfect is the atmosphere!! Cool staff, they offered a bunch of different options to meet people. The dinners are a MUST! 12 € and you can drink as much beer and sangria as you want and get a full dinner...even if you're vegetarian or vegan! wonderful we met so many people while eating, I would definitely go back
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object

review_body: A friend of mine and I recently visited Yeah Hostel - we absolutely loved it. It was in a central location to all tourist attractions, had a great vibe and was very modern and clean. We stayed in a private room for our first stay there- which was very similar to staying in a hotel, but half the cost and on our second visit we had a 4 share female dorm which was also fantastic! The 4 share female dorm came with its own bathroom facilities and was very spacious and private with more than enough room to store your suitcase etc. The staff were amazing - very friendly - spoke great English and we very helpful and welcoming. I would highly reccommend getting down for the dinner, with endless Sangria and Beer included in the 10 Euro price. Its very social time for everyone to connect with each other at the hostel.
hotelName:
30    Yeah Barcelona Hostel
Name: hotel_name, dtype: object
